To | | | | calculate this | | | | amount, click on the | | | | Get Int button. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Overdue | | This refers to the | | Interest | | part amount of | | | | overdue interest from | | | | the indicated period. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Calculated | | This refers to the | | Base Interest | | total calculated | | | | interest based on the | | | | defined base rate. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | This refers to the | | | | account type of the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Schedule Interest | | This refers to the | | of Recent Tenor | | interest accrued for | | | | the latest tenor | | | | starting from the | | | | Calculate To Date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Unpaid | | This refers to the | | Interest up to Recent | | total unpaid interest | | Tenor | | accrued that are | | | | accumulated to the | | | | current tenor | | | | starting from the | | | | Calculate To Date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Posted | | This refers to the | | Interest Amount | | total posted interest | | (FCY) | | (foreign currency) | | | | from the indicated | | | | period. The Get | | | | Posted Int button is | | | | used to calculate | | | | this amount. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Posted | | This refers to the | | Interest Amount | | total calculated | | (LCY) | | interest (Local CCY) | | | | from the indicated | | | | period. The Get | | | | Posted Int button is | | | | used to calculate | | | | this amount. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Payable | | This indicates the | | Interest | | total payable | | | | interest. Click on | | | | the Get Payable | | | | Interest button that | | | | accompanies this | | | | field to display the | | | | system calculated | | | | value. | | | | | | | | This is equal to the | | | | sum of the following | | | | values: | | | | | | | | - Total Payable | | | | Interest 1: Daily | | | | Interest 1 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 1 = | | | | > Original | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > * (Fixed Base Rate | | | | > + Fixed Spread | | | | > Rate)% / Base Days\ | | | | > \ | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the accrual | | | | > takedown date to | | | | > the day preceding | | | | > the payment value | | | | > date. | | | | | | | | - Total Payable | | | | Interest 2: Daily | | | | Interest 2 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 2 = | | | | > New Transaction | | | | > Amount * (Fixed | | | | > Base Rate + Fixed | | | | > Spread Rate)% / | | | | > Base Days\ | | | | > \ | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the payment value | | | | > date to the due | | | | > date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | Fixed Base Rate: 5.3\ | | | | Fixed Spread Rate: | | | | 2.6\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Date: 2020-03-08\ | | | | Payment Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-11\ | | | | Transaction Due Date: | | | | 2020-03-13\ | | | | Takedown Amount: | | | | 10,000.00 USD\ | | | | Payment Amount: | | | | 5,000.00 USD\ | | | | Pay Interest Amount: | | | | 6.49 USD\ | | | | Base Days: 365 | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 1 = | | | | 10,000 * (5.3 + | | | | 2.6)% / 365 = | | | | 2.16438356\ | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest 1= | | | | 2.16438356 * 3 = | | | | 6.49(315608) | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 2 = | | | | 5000 * (5.3 + 2.6)% | | | | / 365 = 1.08219178\ | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest 2= | | | | 1.08219178 * 2+ | | | | 0.00315608 = 2.17 | | | | | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest = 6.49 + | | | | 2.17 = 8.66 | | | | | | | | [NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The italicized value | | | | pertains to the | | | | interest adjustment | | | | used by the system in | | | | the background | | | | calculation. It is | | | | not displayed on the | | | | screen. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Base Payable | | This indicates the | | Interest | | payable interest | | | | excluding the | | | | interest spread. | | | | Click on the Get | | | | Payable Interest | | | | button to display the | | | | system calculated | | | | value. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | Fixed Base Rate: 5.3\ | | | | Fixed Spread Rate: | | | | 2.6\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Date: 2020-03-08\ | | | | Payment Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-11\ | | | | Transaction Due Date: | | | | 2020-03-13\ | | | | Takedown Amount: | | | | 10,000.00 USD\ | | | | Payment Amount: | | | | 5,000.00 USD\ | | | | Pay Interest Amount: | | | | 6.49 USD\ | | | | Base Days: 365 | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 1 = | | | | 10,000 * (5.3+2.6)% | | | | / 365 = 1.45205479\ | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | 1= 1.45205479 * 3 = | | | | 4.35(616437) | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 2 = | | | | 5,000 * 5.3% / 365 = | | | | 0.72602739\ | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | 2= 0.72602739 * 2 + | | | | 0.00616437 = 1.46 | | | | | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | = 4.35 + 1.46 = 5.81 | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The italicized value | | | | pertains to the | | | | interest adjustment | | | | used by the system in | | | | the background | | | | calculation. It is | | | | not displayed on the | | | | screen. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Penalty Payable | | This pertains to the | | Interest | | penalty interest that | | | | applies to the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

{width="0.3333333333333333in” height="0.3333333333333333in”} NOTE: If the specified Transaction Value Date is earlier than the latest interest paid date, the eLOAN system reverses the posted details, and re-generates the updated details.

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image78.p | | following function: | | ng){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Accrual | | | | Functions > Accrual | | | | Payment | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image79.p | | Payment function | | ng){width="3.5in” | | catalog screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Main Ref. No. | | | | (Main Reference | | | | Number) field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image80.p | | relevant record | | ng){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image81.p | | Payment function | | ng){width="3.5in” | | screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | details. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image82.p | | Confirm button on | | ng){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="5.34722222222 | | | | 2222e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image83.p | | Completed screen is | | ng){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To run the function | | | | again, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Accrual ReTakedown

This function is used for increasing the original loan amount.

Figure 3. 3 Accrual ReTakedown Function

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This is the business | | | | unit for which the | | | | transaction is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | This field refers to | | | | the module that is | | | | associated with the | | | | transaction. This is | | | | used for tracking the | | | | origin of the loan in | | | | case it is connected | | | | to other trade | | | | transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Value | | This refers to the | | Date | | date on which the | | | | transaction is made. | | | | This must not be | | | | later than the | | | | initial takedown date | | | | of the transaction. | | | | The date may be | | | | defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction | | This refers to the | | Amount | | amount to be added to | | | | the original loan | | | | amount (created in | | | | Accrual Takedown). | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | This refers to the | | | | account type for the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Book Transaction | | This field indicates | | Amount | | the book value of | | | | bonds. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Payable | | This indicates the | | Interest | | total payable | | | | interest. Click on | | | | the Get Payable | | | | Interest button that | | | | accompanies this | | | | field to display the | | | | system calculated | | | | value. | | | | | | | | This is equal to the | | | | sum of the following | | | | values: | | | | | | | | - Total Payable | | | | Interest 1: Daily | | | | Interest 1 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 1 = | | | | > Original | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > * (Fixed Base Rate | | | | > + Fixed Spread | | | | > Rate)% / Base Days | | | | > | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the original | | | | > transaction date to | | | | > the date preceding | | | | > the current | | | | > transaction date. | | | | | | | | - Total Payable | | | | Interest 2: Daily | | | | Interest 2 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 2 = | | | | > New Transaction | | | | > Amount * (Fixed | | | | > Base Rate + Fixed | | | | > Spread Rate)% / | | | | > Base Days\ | | | | > \ | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the current | | | | > transaction date to | | | | > the due date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | Fixed Base Rate: 5.3\ | | | | Fixed Spread Rate: | | | | 2.6\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-08\ | | | | Re-Takedown Value | | | | Date: 2020-03-11\ | | | | Transaction Due Date: | | | | 2020-03-13\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Amount: 10,000.00 | | | | USD\ | | | | Re-Takedown Amount: | | | | 10000 USD\ | | | | Base Days: 365 | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 1 = | | | | 10,000 * (5.3 + | | | | 2.6)% / 365 = | | | | 2.16438356\ | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest 1= | | | | 2.16438356 * 3 = | | | | 6.49*(315068)* | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 2 = | | | | (10000+10000) * | | | | (5.3+2.6)% / 365 = | | | | 4.32876712\ | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest 2= | | | | 4.32876712 * 2 + | | | | *0.00315068* = 8.66 | | | | | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest = 6.49 + | | | | 8.66 = 15.15 | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The italicized value | | | | pertains to the | | | | interest adjustment | | | | used by the system in | | | | the background | | | | calculation. It is | | | | not displayed on the | | | | screen. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **Base Payable | | This indicates the | | Interest** | | payable interest | | | | excluding the | | | | interest spread. | | | | Click on the Get | | | | Payable Interest | | | | button to display the | | | | system calculated | | | | value. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | **[EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne}** | | | | | | | | Fixed Base Rate: 5.3\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-08\ | | | | Re-Takedown Value | | | | Date: 2020-03-11\ | | | | Transaction Due Date: | | | | 2020-03-13\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Amount: 10,000.00 | | | | USD\ | | | | Re-Takedown Amount: | | | | 10000 USD\ | | | | Base Days: 365 | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 1 = | | | | 10,000 * 5.3% / 365 | | | | = 1.45205479\ | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | 1= 1.45205479 * 3 = | | | | 4.35(616437)\ | | | | Daily Interest 2 = | | | | (10000+10000) * 5.3% | | | | / 365 = 2.90410958\ | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | 2= 2.90410958 * 2 + | | | | 0.00616437 = 5.81\ | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | = 4.35 + 5.81= 10.16 | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The italicized value | | | | pertains to the | | | | interest adjustment | | | | used by the system in | | | | the background | | | | calculation. It is | | | | not displayed on the | | | | screen. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **Penalty Payable | | This pertains to the | | Interest** | | penalty interest that | | | | applies to the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image85.p | | following function: | | ng){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Accrual | | | | Functions > Accrual | | | | ReTakeDown | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image86.p | | ReTakedown function | | ng){width="3.5in” | | catalog screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Main Ref. No. | | | | (Main Reference | | | | Number) field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image87.p | | relevant record | | ng){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image88.p | | ReTakedown function | | ng){width="3.5in” | | screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | details. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image89.p | | Confirm button on | | ng){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="5.625e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image90.p | | Completed screen is | | ng){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To run the function | | | | again, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

{#section-10 .CS-head1}

{#section-11 .CS-head1}

Accrual Extend and Shorten

This function is used for extending or shortening the due date of the loan transaction.

{width="0.3333333333333333in” height="0.3333333333333333in”}NOTE:

i. Accrual Shorten – The New Due Date is earlier than the original Due Date.

ii. Accrual Extend – The New Due Date is later than the original Due Date.

Figure 3. 4 Accrual Extend and Shorten Function

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This refers to the | | | | business unit for | | | | which the transaction | | | | is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | This refers to the | | | | four-character code | | | | for the module where | | | | this transaction is | | | | to be connected. This | | | | is used for tracking | | | | the origin of the | | | | loan in case it is | | | | connected to other | | | | trade transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Value | | Specify the | | Date | | transaction value | | | | date. In case of a | | | | loan extension, this | | | | transaction value | | | | date must not be | | | | earlier than the | | | | original due date. | | | | The date may be | | | | defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | | | | | | | | [NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | For extensions: The | | | | transaction value | | | | date must not be | | | | earlier than the | | | | original due date. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Due Date | | This refers to the | | | | new due date of the | | | | loan principal or | | | | interest. The date | | | | may be changed using | | | | the calendar function | | | | that is provided with | | | | this field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Extend Rate | | If the due date is | | | | extended, specify the | | | | extend rate that is | | | | to be applied in | | | | computing the | | | | interest for the | | | | extended period. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | [NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The | | | | IA_EXTEND_RATE_FLA | | | | G | | | | eLOAN system | | | | parameter controls | | | | whether or not the | | | | extension rate covers | | | | the Base Rate and | | | | Spread Rate after the | | | | extension rate. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | This refers to the | | | | account type for the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Payable | | This indicates the | | Interest | | total payable | | | | interest, including | | | | the spread and extend | | | | interests. Click on | | | | the Get Payable | | | | Interest button that | | | | accompanies this | | | | field to display the | | | | system calculated | | | | value. | | | | | | | | This is equal to the | | | | sum of the following | | | | values: | | | | | | | | - Total Payable | | | | Interest 1: Daily | | | | Interest 1 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 1 = | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > * (Fixed Base Rate | | | | > + Fixed Spread | | | | > Rate)% / Base Days\ | | | | > \ | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the accrual | | | | > takedown date to | | | | > the date preceding | | | | > the extend value | | | | > date. | | | | | | | | - Total Payable | | | | Interest 2: Daily | | | | Interest 2 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 2 = | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > * (Fixed Base Rate | | | | > + Fixed Spread Rate | | | | > + Extend Rate)% / | | | | > Base Days\ | | | | > \ | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the extend value | | | | > date to the new | | | | > transaction due | | | | > date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | Fixed Base Rate: 5.3\ | | | | Fixed Spread Rate: | | | | 2.6\ | | | | Extend Rate: 2.3\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-08\ | | | | Extend Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-13\ | | | | Original Transaction | | | | Due Date: 2020-03-13\ | | | | New Transaction Due | | | | Date: 2020-03-15\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Amount: 10,000.00 | | | | USD\ | | | | Base Days: 365 | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 1 = | | | | 10,000 * (5.3 + | | | | 2.6)% / 365 = | | | | 2.16438356\ | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest 1= | | | | 2.16438356 * 5 = | | | | 10.82(191780) | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 2 = | | | | 10000 * | | | | (5.3+2.6+2.3)% / 365 | | | | = 2.79(452055)\ | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest 2= | | | | 2.79452055 * 2 + | | | | 0.00191780= | | | | 5.59(095890) | | | | | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest = 10.82 + | | | | 5.59 +0.00095890 = | | | | 16.41*(098900)* | | | | | | | | **[NOTE: | | | | ]{.underline}** | | | | | | | | i. The Extend Value | | | | Date must be the | | | | same as original | | | | Transaction Due | | | | Date. | | | | | | | | ii. The italicized | | | | value pertains to | | | | the interest | | | | adjustment used | | | | by the system in | | | | the background | | | | calculation. It | | | | is not displayed | | | | on the screen. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **Base Payable | | This indicates the | | Interest** | | payable interest | | | | excluding the spread | | | | and extend interests. | | | | Click on the Get | | | | Payable Interest | | | | button to display the | | | | system calculated | | | | value. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | **[EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne}** | | | | | | | | Fixed Base Rate: 5.3\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-08\ | | | | Extend Value Date: | | | | 2017-03-13\ | | | | Original Transaction | | | | Due Date: 2020-03-13\ | | | | New Transaction Due | | | | Date: 2020-03-15\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Amount: 10,000.00 | | | | USD\ | | | | Base Days: 365 | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 1 = | | | | 10,000 * 5.3% / 365 | | | | = 1.45205479\ | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | 1= 1.45205479 * 5 = | | | | 7.26(027395) | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 2 = | | | | 10000 * 5.3% / 365 = | | | | 1.45(205480)\ | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | 2= 1.45205480 * 2 = | | | | 2.90(410960) | | | | | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | = 7.26 + 2.90 + | | | | 0.00410960 = | | | | 10.16(410960) | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The italicized value | | | | pertains to the | | | | interest adjustment | | | | used by the system in | | | | the background | | | | calculation. It is | | | | not displayed on the | | | | screen. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **Penalty Payable | | This pertains to the | | Interest** | | penalty interest that | | | | applies to the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image92.p | | following function: | | ng){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Accrual | | | | Functions > Accrual | | | | Extend&Shorten | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image93.p | | Extend&Shorten | | ng){width="3.5in” | | function catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Main Ref. No. | | | | (Main Reference | | | | Number) field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image94.p | | relevant record | | ng){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image95.p | | Extend&Shorten | | ng){width="3.5in” | | function screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | details. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image96.p | | Confirm button on | | ng){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="4.86111111111 | | | | 1111e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image97.p | | Completed screen is | | ng){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To run the function | | | | again, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Accrual Refund Interest

This function is used for processing the refund of an interest which has been paid by customer.

[EXAMPLE:]{.underline}

When the rate is decreased but the user has already paid the interest, the bank must refund the interest to the user.

Figure 3. 5 Accrual Refund Interest Function

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This is the business | | | | unit for which the | | | | transaction is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | This field refers to | | | | the module that is | | | | associated with the | | | | transaction. This is | | | | used for tracking the | | | | origin of the loan in | | | | case it is connected | | | | to other trade | | | | transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Value | | This refers to the | | Date | | date on which the | | | | transaction is made. | | | | This must not be | | | | later than the | | | | initial takedown date | | | | of the transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Refund Interest | | Specify the amount of | | Amount | | paid interest that is | | | | to be refunded. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | This refers to the | | | | account type of the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image99.p | | following function: | | ng){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Accrual | | | | Functions > Accrual | | | | Refund Interest | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image100. | | Refund Interest | | png){width="3.5in” | | function catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Main Ref No (Main | | | | Reference Number) | | | | field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image101. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image102. | | Refund Interest | | png){width="3.5in” | | function screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | details. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image103. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="5.83333333333 | | | | 33334e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image104. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To run the function | | | | again, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Accrual Rate Change

This function is used for changing the interest rate of the loan transaction.

Figure 3. 6 Accrual Rate Change

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This refers to the | | | | business unit for | | | | which the transaction | | | | is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | This field refers to | | | | the module that is | | | | associated with the | | | | transaction. This is | | | | used for tracking the | | | | origin of the loan in | | | | case it is connected | | | | to other trade | | | | transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Value | | Specify the | | Date | | transaction value | | | | date. This must be | | | | the same as or later | | | | than the takedown | | | | date. The date may be | | | | defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Fixed Base Rate | | Update the existing | | | | fixed base rate of | | | | the transaction. It | | | | is applied when the | | | | transaction uses | | | | fixed rates. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Fixed Spread Rate | | Update the existing | | | | fixed spread rate of | | | | the transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Floating Base Rate | | Select the base rate | | Table ID | | table Id from the | | | | dropdown list. It is | | | | applied when the | | | | transaction uses | | | | floating rates. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. If either | | | | Fixed Base Rate or | | | | Fixed Spread Rate is | | | | modified, this field | | | | becomes protected. | | | | | | | | [NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The available tables | | | | are maintained in the | | | | eLOAN Rate Table | | | | functions of the | | | | Standing Data module. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Floating Base Rate | | Select the base rate | | Number | | number from the | | | | dropdown list. This | | | | indicates which | | | | specific base rate | | | | number from the base | | | | rate table is to be | | | | used for the | | | | transaction. It is | | | | applied when the | | | | transaction uses | | | | floating rates. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. If either | | | | Fixed Base Rate or | | | | Fixed Spread Rate is | | | | modified, this field | | | | becomes protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Floating Spread | | Select the spread | | Rate Table ID | | rate table Id from | | | | the dropdown list. It | | | | is applied when the | | | | transaction uses | | | | spread rates. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. If either | | | | Fixed Base Rate or | | | | Fixed Spread Rate is | | | | modified, this field | | | | becomes protected. | | | | | | | | [NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The available tables | | | | are maintained in the | | | | eLOAN Rate Table | | | | functions of the | | | | Standing Data Module. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Floating Spread | | Select the spread | | Rate Number | | rate number from the | | | | dropdown list. This | | | | indicates which | | | | specific spread rate | | | | number from the base | | | | rate table is to be | | | | used for the | | | | transaction. It is | | | | applied when the | | | | transaction uses | | | | spread rates. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. If either | | | | Fixed Base Rate or | | | | Fixed Spread Rate is | | | | modified, this field | | | | becomes protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | This refers to the | | | | account type for the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Payable | | This indicates the | | Interest | | total payable | | | | interest. Click on | | | | the Get Payable | | | | Interest button that | | | | accompanies this | | | | field to display the | | | | system calculated | | | | value. | | | | | | | | If the Fixed Spread | | | | Rate and Spread Rates | | | | are amended, this is | | | | equal to the sum of | | | | the following values: | | | | | | | | - Total Payable | | | | Interest 1: Daily | | | | Interest 1 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 1 = | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > * (Original Fixed | | | | > Base Rate + | | | | > Original Fixed | | | | > Spread Rate)% / | | | | > Base Days\ | | | | > \ | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the accrual | | | | > takedown date to | | | | > the date preceding | | | | > the rate change | | | | > value date. | | | | | | | | - Total Payable | | | | Interest 2: Daily | | | | Interest 2 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 2 = | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > * (New Fixed Base | | | | > Rate + New Fixed | | | | > Spread Rate)% / | | | | > Base Days\ | | | | > \ | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the rate change | | | | > value date to the | | | | > due date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | Original Fixed Base | | | | Rate: 5.3\ | | | | New Fixed Base Rate: | | | | 6\ | | | | Original Fixed Spread | | | | Rate: 2.6\ | | | | New Fixed Spread | | | | Rate: 3\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Date: 2020-03-08\ | | | | Rate Change Value | | | | Date: 2020-03-11\ | | | | Transaction Due Date: | | | | 2020-03-13\ | | | | Takedown Amount: | | | | 10,000.00 USD\ | | | | Base Days: 365 | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 1 = | | | | 10,000* (5.3 + 2.6)% | | | | / 365 = 2.16438356\ | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest 1= | | | | 2.16438356 * 3 = | | | | 6.49(315068) | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 2 = | | | | 10,000 * (6 + 3)% / | | | | 365 = 2.46575342\ | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest 2= | | | | 2.46575342* 2 + | | | | 0.00315068 = | | | | 4.93(465752) | | | | | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest = 6.49 + | | | | 4.93 + 0.00465752 = | | | | 11.42*(465752)* | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The italicized value | | | | pertains to the | | | | interest adjustment | | | | used by the system in | | | | the background | | | | calculation. It is | | | | not displayed on the | | | | screen. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **Base Payable | | This indicates the | | Interest** | | payable interest | | | | excluding the | | | | interest spread. | | | | Click on the Get | | | | Payable Interest | | | | button to display the | | | | system calculated | | | | value. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | **[EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne}** | | | | | | | | Original Fixed Base | | | | Rate: 5.3\ | | | | New Fixed Base Rate: | | | | 6\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-08\ | | | | Rate Change Value | | | | Date: 2020-03-11\ | | | | Transaction Due Date: | | | | 2020-03-13\ | | | | Takedown Amount: | | | | 10,000.00 USD\ | | | | Base Days: 365 | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 1 = | | | | 10,000* 5.3% / 365 = | | | | 1.45205479\ | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | 1= 1.45205479 * 3 = | | | | 4.35*(616437)* | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 2 = | | | | 10,000 * 6% / 365 = | | | | 1.64383561\ | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | 2= 1.64383561 * 2 + | | | | *0.00616437* = | | | | 3.29*(383559)* | | | | | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | = 4.35 + 3.29 + | | | | *0.00383559* = | | | | 7.64*(383559)* | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The italicized value | | | | pertains to the | | | | interest adjustment | | | | used by the system in | | | | the background | | | | calculation. It is | | | | not displayed on the | | | | screen. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **Penalty Payable | | This pertains to the | | Interest** | | penalty interest that | | | | applies to the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image106. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Accrual | | | | Functions > Accrual | | | | Rate Change | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Ang bata | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Accrual Rate | | ![](./media/image107. | | Change function | | png){width="3.5in” | | catalog screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Main Ref. No. | | | | (Main Reference | | | | Number) field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image108. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Accrual Rate | | ![](./media/image109. | | Change function | | png){width="3.5in” | | screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | details. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image110. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="6.38888888888 | | | | 8888e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image111. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To run the function | | | | again, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Accrual Amend

This function is used for amending the details of an Accrual transaction. Through this function, the following types of transactions can be processed:

  • Payment (Pay Principal only, Pay Interest only, Pay Principal and Interest)

  • Re-takedown

  • Extend or Shorten Due Date

  • Base and Spread Rate Change

One or several of these items in a transaction can be amended at the same time through this function.

Figure 3. 7 Accrual Amend Function

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This refers to the | | | | business unit for | | | | which the transaction | | | | is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | This field refers to | | | | the module that is | | | | associated with the | | | | transaction. This is | | | | used for tracking the | | | | origin of the loan in | | | | case it is connected | | | | to other trade | | | | transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Base Days | | This field is used in | | | | calculating interests | | | | on the basis of | | | | interest accrual. | | | | | | | | If no value is | | | | specified, the system | | | | automatically | | | | retrieves the Base | | | | Days value of the | | | | transaction currency | | | | code. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Value | | This refers to the | | Date | | date on which the | | | | transaction is made. | | | | This must not be | | | | later than the | | | | initial takedown date | | | | of the transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction | | This field may refer | | Amount | | to: | | | | | | | | - Payment Amount, | | | | if it is a | | | | negative value; | | | | | | | | - ReTakedown | | | | Amount, if it is | | | | a positive value; | | | | or | | | | | | | | - Loan Amount, if | | | | the value is 0 | | | | (i.e., there is | | | | no change in the | | | | loan amount) | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Book Transaction | | This indicates the | | Amount | | book value of bonds. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Fixed Base Rate | | Update the existing | | | | fixed base rate of | | | | the transaction. It | | | | is applied when the | | | | transaction uses | | | | fixed rates. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | If a new Fixed Base | | | | Rate is specified, | | | | the system | | | | recalculates the | | | | total, base and | | | | penalty payable | | | | interests. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Fixed Spread Rate | | Update the existing | | | | fixed spread rate of | | | | the transaction. It | | | | is applied when the | | | | transaction uses | | | | fixed rates. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | [NOTE: | | | | ]{.underline} | | | | | | | | i. A spread rate is | | | | added to or | | | | subtracted from a | | | | rate to cover | | | | customer risk | | | | levels. Hence, | | | | this field can | | | | accept either a | | | | positive or | | | | negative value. | | | | The spread rate | | | | may be defined | | | | according to | | | | customer type or | | | | transaction type. | | | | | | | | ii. The eLOAN system | | | | supports 0 rate | | | | for premium | | | | interest. If the | | | | value updated in | | | | the Fixed Base | | | | Rate and Fixed | | | | Spread Rate | | | | fields is 0, the | | | | eLOAN system | | | | still | | | | automatically | | | | generates the | | | | schedule and | | | | premium/discount | | | | details. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Floating Base Rate | | Select the updated | | Table ID | | base rate table ID | | | | from the dropdown | | | | list. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. If either | | | | Fixed Base Rate or | | | | Fixed Spread Rate is | | | | modified, this field | | | | becomes protected. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The available tables | | | | are maintained in the | | | | eLOAN Rate Table | | | | functions of the | | | | Standing Data module. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Floating Base Rate | | Select the updated | | Number | | base rate number from | | | | the dropdown list. | | | | This indicates which | | | | specific base rate | | | | number from the base | | | | rate table is to be | | | | used for the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. If either | | | | Fixed Base Rate or | | | | Fixed Spread Rate is | | | | modified, this field | | | | becomes protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Floating Spread | | Select the updated | | Rate Table ID | | spread rate table ID | | | | from the dropdown | | | | list. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. If either | | | | Fixed Base Rate or | | | | Fixed Spread Rate is | | | | modified, this field | | | | becomes protected. | | | | | | | | [NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The available tables | | | | are maintained in the | | | | eLOAN Rate Table | | | | functions of the | | | | Standing Data module. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Floating Spread | | Select the updated | | Rate Number | | spread rate number | | | | from the dropdown | | | | list. This indicates | | | | which specific spread | | | | rate number from the | | | | base rate table is to | | | | be used for the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. If either | | | | Fixed Base Rate or | | | | Fixed Spread Rate is | | | | modified, this field | | | | becomes protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Calculate From | | Specify the start | | Date | | date of the interest | | | | accrual. The date may | | | | be defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Calculate To Date | | Specify the end date | | | | of the interest | | | | accrual. The date may | | | | be defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Calculated | | This refers to the | | Interest | | total calculated | | | | interest from the | | | | indicated period. To | | | | calculate this | | | | amount, click on the | | | | Get Int button. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Paid Interest | | This refers to the | | Amount | | interest amount to be | | | | paid. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | [NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | This amount is not | | | | subtracted to the | | | | Transaction Amount. | | | | Instead, the | | | | Transaction Amount is | | | | the outstanding | | | | principal amount that | | | | is used for interest | | | | accrual. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Calculated | | This refers to the | | Base Interest | | total calculated | | | | interest based on the | | | | defined base rate. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total OverDue | | This refers to the | | Interest | | part amount of | | | | overdue interest from | | | | the indicated period. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Schedule Interest | | This refers to the | | of Recent Tenor | | interest accrued for | | | | the latest tenor | | | | starting from the | | | | Calculate To Date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Unpaid | | This refers to the | | Interest up to Recent | | total unpaid interest | | Tenor | | accrued that are | | | | accumulated to the | | | | current tenor | | | | starting from the | | | | Calculate To Date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Due Date | | Specify the new due | | | | date on of the loan | | | | transaction. The date | | | | may be defined using | | | | the calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | A new due date that | | | | is earlier than the | | | | original due date | | | | indicates that the | | | | due date is | | | | shortened. | | | | | | | | A new due date that | | | | is later than the | | | | original due date | | | | indicates that the | | | | due date is extended. | | | | | | | | A new due date that | | | | is the same as the | | | | original date | | | | indicates that the | | | | due date is not | | | | changed. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | This refers to the | | | | account type for the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Payable | | This indicates the | | Interest | | total payable | | | | interest. Click on | | | | the Get Payable | | | | Interest button that | | | | accompanies this | | | | field to display the | | | | system calculated | | | | value. | | | | | | | | This is equal to the | | | | sum of the following | | | | values: | | | | | | | | - Total Payable | | | | Interest 1: Daily | | | | Interest 1 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 1 = | | | | > Original | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > * (Original Fixed | | | | > Base Rate + | | | | > Original Fixed | | | | > Spread Rate)% / | | | | > Base Days\ | | | | > \ | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the accrual | | | | > takedown value date | | | | > to the date | | | | > preceding the | | | | > accrual amend date. | | | | | | | | - Total Payable | | | | Interest 2: Daily | | | | Interest 2 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 2 = | | | | > New Transaction | | | | > Amount * New Fixed | | | | > Base Rate + New | | | | > Fixed Spread Rate)% | | | | > / Base Days\ | | | | > \ | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the accrual amend | | | | > date to the due | | | | > date. The New | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > is equal to the | | | | > following: Takedown | | | | > Amount + Amend | | | | > Transcation Amount. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | Original Fixed Base | | | | Rate: 5.3\ | | | | New Fixed Base Rate: | | | | 6\ | | | | Original Fixed Spread | | | | Rate: 2.6\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-08\ | | | | Accrual Amend Value | | | | Date: 2020-03-11\ | | | | Transaction Due Date: | | | | 2020-03-13\ | | | | Takedown Amount: | | | | 10,000.00 USD\ | | | | Re-Takedown Amount: | | | | 10,000.00 USD\ | | | | Base Days: 365 | | | | | | | | Fix Base Rate is | | | | amended: | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 1 = | | | | 10,000* (5.3 + 2.6)% | | | | / 365 = 2.16438356\ | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest 1= | | | | 2.16438356 * 3 = | | | | 6.49(315608) | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 2 = | | | | (10,000 + 10,000) * | | | | (6 + 2.6)% / 365 = | | | | 4.71232876\ | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest 2= | | | | 4.71232876 * 2 + | | | | 0.00315608 = | | | | 9.42(781360) | | | | | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest = 6.49 + | | | | 9.42 + 0.00781360 = | | | | 15.91*(781360)* | | | | | | | | **[\ | | | | NOTE: ]{.underline}** | | | | | | | | The italicized value | | | | pertains to the | | | | interest adjustment | | | | used by the system in | | | | the background | | | | calculation. It is | | | | not displayed on the | | | | screen. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **Base Payable | | This indicates the | | Interest** | | payable interest | | | | excluding the | | | | interest spread. | | | | Click on the Get | | | | Payable Interest | | | | button to display the | | | | system calculated | | | | value. | | | | | | | | This is equal to the | | | | sum of the following | | | | values: | | | | | | | | - Base Payable | | | | Interest 1: Daily | | | | Interest 1 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 1 = | | | | > Original | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > * (Original Fixed | | | | > Base Rate)% / Base | | | | > Days\ | | | | > \ | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the accrual | | | | > takedown value date | | | | > to the date | | | | > preceding the | | | | > accrual amend date. | | | | | | | | - Base Payable | | | | Interest 2: Daily | | | | Interest 2 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 2 = | | | | > New Transaction | | | | > Amount * New Fixed | | | | > Base Rate% / Base | | | | > Days\ | | | | > \ | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the accrual amend | | | | > date to the due | | | | > date. The New | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > is equal to the | | | | > following: Takedown | | | | > Amount + Amend | | | | > Transcation Amount. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | **[EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne}** | | | | | | | | Original Fixed Base | | | | Rate: 5.3\ | | | | New Fixed Base Rate: | | | | 6\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-08\ | | | | Accrual Amend Value | | | | Date: 2020-03-11\ | | | | Transaction Due Date: | | | | 2020-03-13\ | | | | Takedown Amount: | | | | 10,000.00 USD\ | | | | Re-Takedown Amount: | | | | 10,000.00 USD\ | | | | Base Days: 365\ | | | | **\ | | | | **Fix Base Rate is | | | | amended: | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 1 = | | | | 10,000* (5.3)% / 365 | | | | = 1.45205479\ | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | 1= 1.45205479 * 3 = | | | | 4.35*(616437)* | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 2 = | | | | (10,000 + 10,000) * | | | | (6)% / 365 = | | | | 3.28767123*\ | | | | *Base Payable | | | | Interest 2= | | | | 3.28767123 * 2 + | | | | *0.00616437* = | | | | 6.58*(150683)* | | | | | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | = 4.35 + 6.58 + | | | | *0.00150683* = | | | | 10.93*(150683)* | | | | | | | | **[NOTE: | | | | ]{.underline}** | | | | | | | | The italicized value | | | | pertains to the | | | | interest adjustment | | | | used by the system in | | | | the background | | | | calculation. It is | | | | not displayed on the | | | | screen. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **Penalty Payable | | This pertains to the | | Interest** | | penalty interest that | | | | applies to the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE: | | | | ]{.underline}** | | | | | | | | If the amend value | | | | date is later than | | | | the due date (+ Grace | | | | Days), the system | | | | calculates the | | | | penalty interest | | | | based on the updated | | | | Transaction Amount, | | | | Base Rate, Spread | | | | Rate, or Due Date. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

{width="0.3333333333333333in” height="0.3333333333333333in”}NOTE:

i. In the Accrual Amend function, any of the following may be updated individually or in combination with another value:

- Transaction Amount\

  • Base Rate\
  • Spread Rate\
  • Due Date

Regardless of the which values are updated, the cut-off time is always the
transaction value date of the Amend function. The calculations of the Total
Interest and Base Payable Interest are divided into two periods:

- From Takedown Date to Amend Value Date – 1, wherein all calculations
use the original value.

- From Amend Value Date to Due Date, wherein all calculations use the
updated value. If the the due date is extended or shortened, the new
due date is applied.

ii. If the Amend Transaction Amount is positive, the transaction is a re-takedown event (i.e., the Amend Transaction Amount is added to the original transaction amount). If the Amend Transaction Amount is negative, the transaction is a payment event (i.e., the Amend Transaction Amount is paid for the accrual transaction.

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image113. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Accrual | | | | Functions > Accrual | | | | Amend | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image114. | | Amend function | | png){width="3.5in” | | catalog screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Main Ref. No. | | | | (Main Reference | | | | Number) field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image115. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image116. | | Amend function | | png){width="3.5in” | | screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | details. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image117. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="5.34722222222 | | | | 2222e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image118. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To run the function | | | | again, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Accrual Change Account Type

This function is used for changing the account type in a transaction. When the account type is changed, the transaction is processed according to the new account type from the posting date preceding this Accrual Change Account Type transaction value date.

{width="0.3333333333333333in” height="0.3333333333333333in”}NOTE: When running the Change Account Type event, eLOAN treats it as a Posting Point, in the same manner as Pay Interest. It generates a posting voucher from (Last Posted Date + 1) to (Transaction Value Date - 1) of the Change Account Type event.

Figure 3. 8 Accrual Change Account Type Function

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This refers to the | | | | business unit for | | | | which the transaction | | | | is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | This field refers to | | | | the module that is | | | | associated with the | | | | transaction. This is | | | | used for tracking the | | | | origin of the loan in | | | | case it is connected | | | | to other trade | | | | transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Value | | Specify the | | Date | | transaction value | | | | date. This must be | | | | the same as or later | | | | than the takedown | | | | date. The date may be | | | | defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | Select an account | | | | type from the | | | | dropdown list. This | | | | is the account to be | | | | used for generating | | | | the eLOAN accounting | | | | entries upon posting. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | | | | | | | | [NOTE: | | | | ]{.underline} | | | | | | | | i. The available | | | | account types are | | | | defined in the | | | | eLOAN Account | | | | Type functions of | | | | the Standing Data | | | | module. | | | | | | | | ii. If the Account | | | | Type is not | | | | changed, the | | | | total, base and | | | | penalty payable | | | | interests default | | | | to 0. Otherwise, | | | | the system | | | | calculates these | | | | based on the new | | | | Account Type | | | | setting. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Payable | | This indicates the | | Interest | | total payable | | | | interest. Click on | | | | the Get Payable | | | | Interest button that | | | | accompanies this | | | | field to display the | | | | system calculated | | | | value. | | | | | | | | This is equal to the | | | | sum of the following | | | | values: | | | | | | | | - Total Payable | | | | Interest 1: Daily | | | | Interest 1 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 1 = | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > * (Fixed Base Rate | | | | > + Fixed Spread | | | | > Rate)% / Base Days | | | | > | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the accrual | | | | > takedown value date | | | | > to the date | | | | > preceding the | | | | > account type change | | | | > value date. | | | | | | | | - Total Payable | | | | Interest 2: Daily | | | | Interest 2 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 2 = | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > * (Fixed Base Rate | | | | > - Fixed Spread | | | | > Rate)% / Base Days | | | | > | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the account type | | | | > change value date | | | | > to the due date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Base Payable | | This indicates the | | Interest | | payable interest | | | | excluding the | | | | interest spread. | | | | Click on the Get | | | | Payable Interest | | | | button to display the | | | | system calculated | | | | value. | | | | | | | | The system calculates | | | | this as: | | | | | | | | > Base Payable | | | | > Interest = Daily | | | | > Interest * Days | | | | | | | | The Daily Interest is | | | | calculated as | | | | follows: | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest = | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > * Fixed Base Rate | | | | > % / Base Days | | | | | | | | Days pertain to the | | | | number of days from | | | | the accrual takedown | | | | value date to the | | | | date preceding the | | | | due date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Penalty Payable | | This pertains to the | | Interest | | penalty interest that | | | | applies to the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | The system calculates | | | | this as: | | | | | | | | > Penalty Payable | | | | > Interest = Daily | | | | > Interest * Days | | | | | | | | The Daily Interest is | | | | calculated as | | | | follows: | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest = | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > * Penalty Rate % / | | | | > Base Days | | | | | | | | Days pertain to the | | | | number of days from | | | | the due date to the | | | | date preceding the | | | | account type change | | | | value date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | [NOTE: | | | | ]{.underline} | | | | | | | | If the account type | | | | change value date is | | | | later than the due | | | | date (+ Grace Days), | | | | the system calculates | | | | the penalty interest | | | | based on the updated | | | | account type setting. | | | | If the account type | | | | change value date | | | | falls on or before | | | | the due date, the | | | | penalty rate is 0. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image120. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Accrual | | | | Functions > Accrual | | | | Change Account Type | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image121. | | Change Account Type | | png){width="3.5in” | | function catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Main Ref. No. | | | | (Main Reference | | | | Number) field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image122. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image123. | | Change Account Type | | png){width="3.5in” | | function screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | details. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image124. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="5.55555555555 | | | | 5555e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image125. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To run the function | | | | again, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Accrual Change Base Days

The Base Days is used to calculate the interest of transactions. The Accrual Change Base Days function is used for changing this Base Days details.

Figure 3. 9 Accrual Change Base Days Function

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This refers to the | | | | business unit for | | | | which the transaction | | | | is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | This field refers to | | | | the module that is | | | | associated with the | | | | transaction. This is | | | | used for tracking the | | | | origin of the loan in | | | | case it is connected | | | | to other trade | | | | transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Value | | Specify the | | Date | | transaction value | | | | date. This must be | | | | the same as or later | | | | than the takedown | | | | date. The date may be | | | | defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Base Days | | Specify the new | | | | number of Base Days. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | | | | | | | | [NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | If a new Base Days | | | | value is specified, | | | | the system | | | | recalculates the | | | | total, base and | | | | penalty payable | | | | interests; otherwise, | | | | these payable | | | | interests are not | | | | changed. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | This refers to the | | | | account type for the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Payable | | This indicates the | | Interest | | total payable | | | | interest. Click on | | | | the Get Payable | | | | Interest button that | | | | accompanies this | | | | field to display the | | | | system calculated | | | | value. | | | | | | | | This is equal to the | | | | sum of the following | | | | values: | | | | | | | | - Total Payable | | | | Interest 1: Daily | | | | Interest 1 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 1 = | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > * (Fixed Base Rate | | | | > + Fixed Spread | | | | > Rate)% / Original | | | | > Base Days\ | | | | > \ | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the accrual | | | | > takedown value date | | | | > to the date | | | | > preceding the base | | | | > days change value | | | | > date. | | | | | | | | - Total Payable | | | | Interest 2: Daily | | | | Interest 2 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 2 = | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > * (Fixed Base Rate | | | | > + Fixed Spread | | | | > Rate)% / New Base | | | | > Days\ | | | | > \ | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the base days | | | | > change value date | | | | > to the due date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | Fixed Base Rate: 5.3\ | | | | Fixed Spread Rate: | | | | 2.6\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-08\ | | | | Base Days Change | | | | Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-11\ | | | | Transaction Due Date: | | | | 2020-03-13\ | | | | Takedown Amount: | | | | 10,000.00 USD\ | | | | Original Base Days: | | | | 365\ | | | | New Base Days: 360 | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 1 = | | | | 10,000* (5.3 + 2.6)% | | | | / 365 = 2.16438356\ | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest 1= | | | | 2.16438356 * 3 = | | | | 6.49(315068) | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 2 = | | | | 10,000 * (5.3 + | | | | 2.6)% / 360 = | | | | 2.19444444\ | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest 2= | | | | 2.19444444 * 2 + | | | | 0.00315068 = | | | | 4.39(203956) | | | | | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest = 6.49 + | | | | 4.39 + 0.00203956 = | | | | 10.88(203956) | | | | | | | | [NOTE: | | | | ]{.underline} | | | | | | | | i. Base Days may be | | | | > amended after | | | | > accrual | | | | > takedown or any | | | | > other accrual | | | | > event (i.e. | | | | > payment or | | | | > re-takedown). | | | | > The above | | | | > example shows | | | | > base days | | | | > amendment after | | | | > the accrual | | | | > takedown. In | | | | > case of the | | | | > latter, the | | | | > updated values, | | | | > including the | | | | > new base days, | | | | > are used in the | | | | > calculation of | | | | > Daily | | | | > Interest 2. | | | | | | | | ii. The italicized | | | | > value pertains | | | | > to the interest | | | | > adjustment used | | | | > by the system | | | | > in the | | | | > background | | | | > calculation. It | | | | > is not | | | | > displayed on | | | | > the screen. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Base Payable | | This indicates the | | Interest | | payable interest | | | | excluding the | | | | interest spread. | | | | Click on the Get | | | | Payable Interest | | | | button to display the | | | | system calculated | | | | value. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | Fixed Base Rate: 5.3\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-08\ | | | | Base Days Change | | | | Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-11\ | | | | Transaction Due Date: | | | | 2020-03-13\ | | | | Takedown Amount: | | | | 10,000.00 USD\ | | | | Original Base Days: | | | | 365\ | | | | New Base Days: 360 | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 1 = | | | | 10,000 * 5.3% / 365 | | | | = 1.45205479\ | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | 1= 1.45205479 * 3 = | | | | 4.35*(616437)* | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 2 = | | | | 10000 * 5.3% / 360 = | | | | 1.47222222\ | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | 2= 1.47222222 * 2 + | | | | 0.00616437= | | | | 2.95(060881) | | | | | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | = 4.35 + 2.94 + | | | | 0.00060881= | | | | 7.29(060881) | | | | | | | | **[NOTE: | | | | ]{.underline}** | | | | | | | | i. Base Days may be | | | | amended after | | | | accrual takedown | | | | or any other | | | | accrual event | | | | (i.e. payment or | | | | re-takedown). The | | | | above example | | | | shows base days | | | | amendment after | | | | the accrual | | | | takedown. In case | | | | of the latter, | | | | the updated | | | | values, including | | | | the new base | | | | days, are used in | | | | the calculation | | | | of Daily | | | | Interest 2. | | | | | | | | ii. The italicized | | | | value pertains to | | | | the interest | | | | adjustment used | | | | by the system in | | | | the background | | | | calculation. It | | | | is not displayed | | | | on the screen. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **Penalty Payable | | This pertains to the | | Interest** | | penalty interest that | | | | applies to the | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE: | | | | ]{.underline}** | | | | | | | | If the base days | | | | change value date is | | | | later than the due | | | | date (+ Grace Days), | | | | the system calculates | | | | the penalty interest | | | | based on the updated | | | | Base Days value. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image127. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Accrual | | | | Functions > Accrual | | | | Change Base Days | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image128. | | Change Base Days | | png){width="3.5in” | | function catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Main Ref. No. | | | | (Main Reference | | | | Number) field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image129. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image130. | | Change Base Days | | png){width="3.5in” | | function screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | details. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image131. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="6.59722222222 | | | | 2222e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image132. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To run the function | | | | again, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Accrual Change Penalty Rate

The penalty rate is added to the interest rate if the loan is not settled on the maturity date. The Accrual Change Penalty Rate function is used for changing this penalty rate.

{width="0.3333333333333333in” height="0.3333333333333333in”}NOTE:

i. Penalty rates are defined in the eLOAN Account Type functions of the Standing Data module.

ii. If the loan is overdue, and this function is not run, the system retrieves the penalty rate from the corresponding eLOAN account type.

Figure 3. 10 Accrual Change Penalty Rate

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This refers to the | | | | business unit for | | | | which the transaction | | | | is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | This field refers to | | | | the module that is | | | | associated with the | | | | transaction. This is | | | | used for tracking the | | | | origin of the loan in | | | | case it is connected | | | | to other trade | | | | transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Value | | Specify the | | Date | | transaction value | | | | date.
