The date may be | | | | defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | The value of this | | | | field must be later | | | | than the Due Date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Penalty Rate | | Specify the new | | | | penalty rate. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | This refers to the | | | | account type for the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Payable | | This indicates the | | Interest | | total payable | | | | interest. Click on | | | | the Get Payable | | | | Interest button that | | | | accompanies this | | | | field to display the | | | | system calculated | | | | value. | | | | | | | | If the current | | | | Transaction Value | | | | Date falls on the due | | | | date or within the | | | | grace period, the | | | | calculation of this | | | | field is the same as | | | | that of the Accrual | | | | Extend and Shorten | | | | function. Refer to | | | | this function’s | | | | discussion on this | | | | chapter: [Accrual | | | | Extend | | | | Shorten](#accrual-ext | | | | end-and-shorten). | | | | | | | | When overdue, the | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest is equal to | | | | the sum of the | | | | following values: | | | | | | | | - Total Payable | | | | Interest 1: Daily | | | | Interest 1 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 1 = | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > * (Fixed Base Rate | | | | > + Fixed Spread | | | | > Rate)% / Base Days\ | | | | > \ | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the accrual | | | | > takedown date to | | | | > the date preceding | | | | > the Transaction Due | | | | > Date + Grace Days. | | | | | | | | - Total Payable | | | | Interest 2: Daily | | | | Interest 2 * | | | | Days | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest 2 = | | | | > Transaction Amount | | | | > * (Fixed Base Rate | | | | > + Fixed Spread Rate | | | | > + Original Penalty | | | | > Rate)% / Base Days\ | | | | > \ | | | | > Days pertain to the | | | | > number of days from | | | | > the Transaction Due | | | | > date + Grace Days | | | | > to the date | | | | > preceding the | | | | > penalty rate change | | | | > value date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | Fixed Base Rate: 5.3\ | | | | Fixed Spread Rate: | | | | 2.6\ | | | | Original Penalty Rate | | | | ; 2.3\ | | | | New Penalty Rate: | | | | 2.5\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-08\ | | | | Change Penalty Rate | | | | Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-17\ | | | | Transaction Due Date: | | | | 2020-03-13\ | | | | Grace Days: 2\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Amount: 10,000.00 | | | | USD\ | | | | Base Days: 365 | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 1 = | | | | 10,000 * (5.3 + | | | | 2.6)% / 365 = | | | | 2.16438356\ | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest 1= | | | | 2.16438356 * 5 = | | | | 10.82(191780) | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 2 = | | | | 10000 * | | | | (5.3+2.6+2.3)% / 365= | | | | 2.79(452055)\ | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest 2= | | | | 2.79452055 * 4 + | | | | 0.0091780 = | | | | 11.18(726020) | | | | | | | | Total Payable | | | | Interest = 10.82 + | | | | 11.18 + 0.00726020 = | | | | 22.00(726020) | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The italicized value | | | | pertains to the | | | | interest adjustment | | | | used by the system in | | | | the background | | | | calculation. It is | | | | not displayed on the | | | | screen. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Base Payable | | This indicates the | | Interest | | payable interest | | | | excluding the | | | | interest spread. | | | | Click on the Get | | | | Payable Interest | | | | button to display the | | | | system calculated | | | | value. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | Fixed Base Rate: 5.3\ | | | | Fixed Spread Rate: | | | | 2.6\ | | | | Original Penalty Rate | | | | ; 2.3\ | | | | New Penalty Rate: | | | | 2.5\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-08\ | | | | Change Penalty Rate | | | | Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-17\ | | | | Transaction Due Date: | | | | 2020-03-13\ | | | | Grace Days: 2\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Amount: 10,000.00 | | | | USD\ | | | | Base Days: 365 | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 1= | | | | 10,000 * 5.3% / 365 | | | | = 1.45205479\ | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | = 1.45205479 * 5 = | | | | 7.26(027395) | | | | | | | | Daily Interest 2 = | | | | 10,000 * 5.3% / 365 | | | | = 1.45205479\ | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | 2= 1.45205479 * 4 + | | | | 0.00027395= | | | | 5.80(849311) | | | | | | | | Base Payable Interest | | | | = 7.26 + 5.80 + | | | | 0.00849311= | | | | 13.06(849311) | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The italicized value | | | | pertains to the | | | | interest adjustment | | | | used by the system in | | | | the background | | | | calculation. It is | | | | not displayed on the | | | | screen. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Penalty Payable | | This pertains to the | | Interest | | penalty interest that | | | | applies to the | | | | transaction. When the | | | | Get Payable Interest | | | | button is clicked, | | | | the system displays | | | | the calculated value. | | | | | | | | If the current | | | | Transaction Value | | | | Date falls on the due | | | | date or within the | | | | grace period, this is | | | | 0; otherwise, the | | | | system calculates the | | | | Penalty Payable | | | | Interest as: | | | | | | | | > Penalty Payable | | | | > Interest = Daily | | | | > Interest * Days. | | | | | | | | Days pertain to the | | | | number of days from | | | | the due date to the | | | | date preceding the | | | | penalty rate change | | | | value date. | | | | | | | | The Daily Interest is | | | | calculated as | | | | follows: | | | | | | | | > Daily Interest = | | | | > Takedown Amount * | | | | > (Penalty Rate)% / | | | | > Base Days | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | | | | | | | | **[\ | | | | EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | Fixed Base Rate: 5.3\ | | | | Fixed Spread Rate: | | | | 2.6\ | | | | Original Penalty Rate | | | | ; 2.3\ | | | | New Penalty Rate: | | | | 2.5\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-08\ | | | | Change Penalty Rate | | | | Value Date: | | | | 2020-03-17\ | | | | Transaction Due Date: | | | | 2020-03-13\ | | | | Grace Days: 2\ | | | | Accrual Takedown | | | | Amount: 10,000.00 | | | | USD\ | | | | Base Days: 365 | | | | | | | | Daily Interest = | | | | 10,000 * 2.3% / 365 | | | | = 0.63013699\ | | | | Penalty Payable | | | | Interest = 0.63013699 | | | | * 4 = 2.52(054796) | | | | | | | | [\ | | | | NOTE: ]{.underline} | | | | | | | | i. In the above | | | | > example, the | | | | > original | | | | > Penalty Rate | | | | > and the Grace | | | | > Days are | | | | > defined in | | | | > Accrual | | | | > Takedown event. | | | | | | | | ii. The italicized | | | | > value pertains | | | | > to the interest | | | | > adjustment used | | | | > by the system | | | | > in the | | | | > background | | | | > calculation. It | | | | > is not | | | | > displayed on | | | | > the screen. | | | | | | | | iii. Within the grace | | | | > days period, | | | | > the system does | | | | > not calculate | | | | > penalty | | | | > interest. After | | | | > this period, | | | | > the system | | | | > calculates the | | | | > penalty | | | | > intesrest from | | | | > the due date to | | | | > the latest | | | | > eLOAN | | | | > Transaction | | | | > Value Date | | | | > (Grace days | | | | > period is | | | | > covered). | | | | | | | | iv. The new Penalty | | | | > Rate defined is | | | | > applied to | | | | > penalty | | | | > interest | | | | > calculation | | | | > only after the | | | | > penalty rate | | | | > change date. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image134. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Accrual | | | | Functions > Accrual | | | | Change Penalty Rate | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image135. | | Change Penalty Rate | | png){width="3.5in” | | function catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Main Ref. No. | | | | (Main Reference | | | | Number) field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image136. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image137. | | Change Penalty Rate | | jpeg) | | function screen is | | | | displayed. | | | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | details. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image131. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="6.59722222222 | | | | 2222e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image138. | | Completed screen is | | jpeg) | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To run the function | | | | again, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Accrual Inquire Interest

This function is used for checking or inquiring on the interest accrued over a specified period.

{width="0.3333333333333333in” height="0.3333333333333333in”}NOTE: This function is used to test the online accrual feature, which uses the inquire GAPI 8013 transaction code (Inquire Interest).

Figure 3. 11 Accrual Inquire Interest Function

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This is the business | | | | unit for which the | | | | transaction is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | This field refers to | | | | the module that is | | | | associated with the | | | | transaction. This is | | | | used for tracking the | | | | origin of the loan in | | | | case it is connected | | | | to other trade | | | | transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | This refers to the | | | | account type for the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Calculate From | | Specify the start | | Date | | date of the interest | | | | accrual. The date may | | | | be defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Calculate To Date | | Specify the end date | | | | of the interest | | | | accrual. The date may | | | | be defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The | | | | IA_TODATE_INCLUDE_ | | | | FLAG | | | | eLOAN system | | | | parameter controls | | | | whether or not this | | | | To Date field is to | | | | be used in interest | | | | inquiry. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Calculated | | This refers to the | | Interest | | total calculated | | | | interest from the | | | | indicated period. To | | | | calculate this | | | | amount, click on the | | | | Get Int button. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total OverDue | | This refers to the | | Interest | | part amount of | | | | overdue interest from | | | | the indicated period. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Calculated | | This refers to the | | Base Interest | | total calculated | | | | interest based on the | | | | defined base rate. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Calculated | | This refers to the | | Spread Interest | | total calculated | | | | interest based on the | | | | defined spread rate. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Calculated | | This refers to the | | Penalty Interest | | total calculated | | | | interest based on the | | | | defined penalty rate. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Schedule Interest | | This refers to the | | of Recent Tenor | | interest accrued for | | | | the latest tenor | | | | starting from the | | | | Calculate To Date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Unpaid | | This refers to the | | Interest up to Recent | | total unpaid interest | | Tenor | | accrued that are | | | | accumulated to the | | | | current tenor | | | | starting from the | | | | Calculate To Date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Unpaid Base | | This refers to the | | Interest | | total base interest | | | | that is unpaid. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Unpaid Spread | | This refers to the | | Interest | | spread interest that | | | | is unpaid. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Unpaid | | This refers to the | | Penalty Interest | | total penalty | | | | interest that is | | | | unpaid. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Posted | | This refers to the | | Interest Amount | | total posted interest | | (FCY) | | from the indicated | | | | period. The Get | | | | Posted Int button is | | | | used to calculate | | | | this amount. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Posted | | This refers to the | | Interest Amount | | total calculated | | (LCY) | | interest (Local CCY) | | | | from the indicated | | | | period. The Get | | | | Posted Int button is | | | | used to calculate | | | | this amount. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image140. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Accrual | | | | Functions > Accrual | | | | Inquire Interest | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image141. | | Inquire Interest | | png){width="3.5in” | | function catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Main Ref. No. | | | | (Main Reference | | | | Number) field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image142. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image143. | | Inquire Interest | | png){width="3.5in” | | function screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | details. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image131. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="6.59722222222 | | | | 2222e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image144. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To run the function | | | | again, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Accrual Stop

This function is used for temporarily stopping the interest accrual and the posting of a transaction.

When a transaction has a ‘stopped’ status, any event can be processed without interest and posting.

Figure 3. 12 Accrual Stop Function

{width="0.3333333333333333in” height="0.3333333333333333in”}NOTE:

i. A stopped transaction may be restored using the Accrual Restart function (Restart event).

ii. If the last posted date is earlier than the transaction value date of the Stop event, the system continues to post until this date:
(Transaction Value Date of the Stop event - 1)

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This refers to the | | | | business unit for | | | | which the transaction | | | | is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | This field refers to | | | | the module that is | | | | associated with the | | | | transaction. This is | | | | used for tracking the | | | | origin of the loan in | | | | case it is connected | | | | to other trade | | | | transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Value | | Specify the | | Date | | transaction value | | | | date. This must be | | | | the same as or later | | | | than the takedown | | | | date. The date may be | | | | defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | This refers to the | | | | account type for the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image146. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Accrual | | | | Functions > Accrual | | | | Stop | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Accrual Stop | | ![](./media/image147. | | function catalog | | png){width="3.5in” | | screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Main Ref. No. | | | | (Main Reference | | | | Number) field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image148. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Accrual Stop | | ![](./media/image149. | | function screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | Specify the relevant | | | | details. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image131. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="6.59722222222 | | | | 2222e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image150. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To run the function | | | | again, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Accrual Restart

This function is used for restoring a ‘stopped’ transaction. Once the stopped transaction is restarted, the interest is accrued and posted beginning from the stopped value date.

Figure 3. 13 Accrual Restart Function

{width="0.3333333333333333in” height="0.3333333333333333in”}NOTE: A transaction is stopped through the Accrual Stop function.

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This refers to the | | | | business unit for | | | | which the transaction | | | | is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | This field refers to | | | | the module that is | | | | associated with the | | | | transaction. This is | | | | used for tracking the | | | | origin of the loan in | | | | case it is connected | | | | to other trade | | | | transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Value | | Specify the | | Date | | transaction value | | | | date. This must be | | | | the same as or later | | | | than the takedown | | | | date. The date may be | | | | defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | This refers to the | | | | account type for the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image152. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Accrual | | | | Functions > Accrual | | | | Restart | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image153. | | Restart function | | png){width="3.5in” | | catalog screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Main Ref. No. | | | | (Main Reference | | | | Number) field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image154. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image155. | | Restart function | | png){width="3.5in” | | screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | details. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image156. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="6.875e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image157. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To run the function | | | | again, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Accrual Rollback

This function is used for reversing all the eLOAN events performed up to a defined rollback date, thereby allowing the system to redo all the interest postings starting from this rollback date.

When a rollback event is processed for a transaction, the system marks this event as disabled; a flag is set to mark the transaction. However, the reversed eLOAN events are not removed from the system; a disabled event can still be inquired on.

The Accrual Rollback function can process the following events:

  • Re-Takedown

  • Payment (Pay Principal only)

  • Extend and Shorten

  • Rate Change

  • Amend

  • Restart

  • Change Account Type

  • Change Base Days

  • Change Penalty Rate

{width="0.3333333333333333in” height="0.3333333333333333in”}NOTE: The Rollback function may not perform these events: Stop, Cancel, and Rollback event.

Figure 3. 14 Accrual Rollback Function

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This refers to the | | | | business unit for | | | | which the transaction | | | | is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | This field refers to | | | | the module that is | | | | associated with the | | | | transaction. This is | | | | used for tracking the | | | | origin of the loan in | | | | case it is connected | | | | to other trade | | | | transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Value | | Specify the | | Date | | transaction value | | | | date. This must be | | | | the same as or later | | | | than the takedown | | | | date. The date may be | | | | defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Rollback Event No | | Specify the number of | | | | the starting event | | | | for the rollback | | | | process. The event | | | | number can be | | | | determined by | | | | inquiring on the | | | | transaction and | | | | viewing all its event | | | | files. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | This refers to the | | | | account type for the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image159. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Accrual | | | | Functions > Accrual | | | | Rollback | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image160. | | Rollback function | | png){width="3.5in” | | catalog screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Main Ref. No. | | | | (Main Reference | | | | Number) field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image161. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Accrual | | ![](./media/image162. | | Rollback function | | png){width="3.5in” | | screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | details. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | ![](./media/image163. | | ** | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.79130468066 | | The event number can | | 49169in”} | | be determined by | | | | inquiring on the | | | | transaction and | | | | viewing all its event | | | | files. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image164. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="6.11111111111 | | | | 1111e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. {#section-12 .CS-head1}

Accrual Cancel

This function is used for cancelling an Accrual loan transaction.

If the transaction value date for this cancellation is later than the last posted date, the accounting entries remain the same. If the value date is earlier than the last posted date (i.e., Cancel with Back Valuation), the posted accounting entries are reversed until the last posted day of the Cancel event.

A cancelled transaction can no longer be processed with any other event.

Figure 3. 15 Accrual Cancel Function

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This refers to the | | | | business unit for | | | | which the transaction | | | | is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | This field refers to | | | | the module that is | | | | associated with the | | | | transaction. This is | | | | used for tracking the | | | | origin of the loan in | | | | case it is connected | | | | to other trade | | | | transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Value | | Specify the | | Date | | transaction value | | | | date. This must be | | | | the same as or later | | | | than the takedown | | | | date. The date may be | | | | defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | This refers to the | | | | account type for the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image172. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To run the function | | | | again, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

eLOAN Reverse Posting

This function is used for reversing entries with a value date that is greater than or equal to the transaction value date and for setting the total posted interest and premium /discount to the status of the day that precedes the transaction value date.

This function is especially useful for sell securities bond transactions: the correct balance of a discount or premium is obtained.

This function cannot process Retakedown and Payment events which value date is greater than or equal to the reversed transaction value date.

Figure 3. 16 eLOAN Reverse Posting Function

{width="0.3333333333333333in” height="0.3333333333333333in”}NOTE: eLOAN Reverse Posting is a non-standard function. It may be set up for a bank's particular requirements. For the parameter settings, refer to the eLOAN Reverse Posting Function: Parameter Settings discussion

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This refers to the | | | | business unit for | | | | which the transaction | | | | is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | This field refers to | | | | the module that is | | | | associated with the | | | | transaction. This is | | | | used for tracking the | | | | origin of the loan in | | | | case it is connected | | | | to other trade | | | | transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Value | | This refers to the | | Date | | date on which the | | | | reversal is made. All | | | | the posted entries | | | | from this date to the | | | | Last Posting Date are | | | | going to be reversed | | | | accordingly. | | | | | | | | This date must be | | | | earlier or the same | | | | as the Last Posting | | | | Date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image174. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Accrual | | | | Functions > eLOAN | | | | Reverse Posting | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. +———————————————————————–+ | []{#eLOAN_Reverse_Posting_Fxn_Para_Settings .anchor}eLOAN Reverse | | Posting Function: Parameter Settings | | | | To set up the parameters for the eLOAN Reverse Posting function: | | | | 1. Create a new eLOAN GAPI event: 8112. | | | | > {width="4.583999343832021in” | | > height="2.559161198600175in”} | | > | | > {width="4.5956036745406825in” | | > height="0.9735225284339457in”} | | > | | > {width="4.705521653543307in” | | > height="1.3693897637795276in”} | | | | b. eLOAN Amortization Functions

  • Introduction to THE eLOAN Amortization Functions

  • Amortization Takedown

  • Amortization Payment

  • Amortization Retakedown

  • Amortization Extend AND SHorten

  • Amortization Amend

  • Amortization Rollback

  • Amortization Cancel

  • AMORTIZATION CHANGE PENALTY RATE

  • AMORTIZATION STOP

  • AMORTIZATION RESTART

{#section-13 .CS-head1}

Introduction to the eLOAN Amortization Functions

Amortization involves the discounting of an amount at a particular rate for a predefined period of time. Interest is charged upon the creation of the loan. The money released to the borrower is the full amount of the principal minus the interest charged. The outstanding amount collected at the maturity of the loan is the full amount of the loan.

The eLOAN Amortization Functions group consists of the following functions:

  • Amortization Takedown

  • Amortization Payment

  • Amortization Retakedown

  • Amortization Extend and Shorten

  • Amortization Amend

  • Amortization Rollback

  • Amortization Cancel

  • Amortization Change Penalty Rate

{width="0.3333333333333333in” height="0.3333333333333333in”}NOTE: The eLOAN Accrual and eLOAN Amortization functions in the eLOAN Transaction Module are normally used for testing purposes. In a typical project development process, the relevant functions – which include the required business fields – are created in the EE system, and then the relevant eLOAN GAPI templates are appended to these functions to integrate with the eLOAN sub-system for the accrued/amortized interest calculation. The eLOAN Inquire and eLOAN Batch functions, however, can be used by end users to view the eLOAN interest calculations and run batch processes manually.

Amortization Takedown

The Amortization Takedown function is used for initiating the creation of an amortization transaction.

Figure 4. 1 Amortization Takedown Function

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | system-generated | | | | transaction reference | | | | number for the | | | | record. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Borrower ID | | Specify the ID of the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | This value must match | | | | the corresponding | | | | customer record in | | | | EE. This is typically | | | | mapped from the EE | | | | transaction. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | Select an account | | | | type for the Borrower | | | | from the dropdown | | | | list. The available | | | | account types are | | | | defined in the eLOAN | | | | Account Type | | | | functions of the | | | | Standing Data module. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The available account | | | | types are defined in | | | | the eLOAN Account | | | | Type functions of the | | | | Standing Data module. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Value | | Specify the date of | | Date | | the takedown. The | | | | date may be defined | | | | using the calendar | | | | function that | | | | accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Currency Code | | Select the relevant | | | | currency from the | | | | dropdown list. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction | | Specify the loan | | Amount | | amount. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | Specify the | | | | 4-character code of | | | | the module with which | | | | the transaction is to | | | | be associated. This | | | | is used for tracking | | | | the origin of the | | | | loan in case it is | | | | connected to other | | | | trade transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Due Date | | Specify the date on | | | | which the loan | | | | principal or interest | | | | must be completely | | | | paid. The date may be | | | | defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Fixed Base Rate | | Specify the fixed | | | | base rate. It is | | | | applied when the | | | | calculated discount | | | | amount is to be | | | | obtained. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Fixed Spread Rate | | Specify the fixed | | | | spread rate. This | | | | rate is not changed | | | | unless an event for | | | | Change Rate is | | | | executed. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | [NOTE: | | | | ]{.underline} | | | | | | | | i. A spread rate is | | | | added to or | | | | subtracted from a | | | | rate to cover | | | | customer risk | | | | levels. Hence, this | | | | field can accept | | | | either a positive | | | | or negative value. | | | | The spread rate may | | | | be defined | | | | according to | | | | customer type or | | | | transaction type. | | | | | | | | ii. The eLOAN | | | | system supports 0 | | | | rate for premium | | | | interest. If the | | | | value updated in | | | | the Fixed Base Rate | | | | and Fixed Spread | | | | Rate fields is 0, | | | | the eLOAN system | | | | still automatically | | | | generates the | | | | schedule and | | | | premium/discount | | | | details. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Grace Days | | Specify the number of | | | | grace days that is | | | | applicable to the | | | | loan. Grace Days | | | | pertain to the days | | | | after the Due Date | | | | during which the | | | | record is not | | | | converted to an | | | | Accrual file. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Penalty Rate | | Specify the penalty | | | | interest that is to | | | | be used for | | | | calculating the | | | | Accrual interest for | | | | overdue amounts. In a | | | | takedown, this | | | | penalty rate is used | | | | (and not the default | | | | penalty rate defined | | | | in the eLOAN Account | | | | Type setting) if the | | | | penalty rate is | | | | passed on to eLOAN | | | | when the Amortization | | | | record is overdue and | | | | converted to accrual | | | | record. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Calculated | | This refers to the | | Interest | | total discount | | | | interest amount | | | | calculated from | | | | Takedown Date to Due | | | | Date. To calculate | | | | this amount, click on | | | | the Get Int button. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | If the amount is not | | | | calculated by eLOAN, | | | | this field is | | | | protected. The Get | | | | Int button is also | | | | disabled. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Base Days | | Specify the number of | | | | days in a year that | | | | is used in | | | | calculating interests | | | | on the basis of | | | | interest accrual. The | | | | value defaults to | | | | 365. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Calculated | | This refers to the | | Base Interest | | total calculated | | | | interest based on the | | | | defined base rate. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Original Branch | | This is for special | | | | projects only. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Level | | This refer s to the | | | | account level to be | | | | appended into the | | | | account number for | | | | eLOAN voucher. This | | | | setting only takes | | | | effect if the eLOAN | | | | system parameters | | | | IA_GL_INTF_BANK_N | | | | AME | | | | and | | | | IA_ACCOUNTNO_MODULI | | | | ST | | | | are set. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Code | | This field is used | | | | for specific purposes | | | | during posting. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Customer Code | | This field is used | | | | for specific purposes | | | | during posting. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Purpose ID | | This is for special | | | | projects only. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Form ID | | This is for special | | | | projects only. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Discount Local | | This is the currency | | Currency | | of the directly | | | | discounted interest | | | | amount. It is used | | | | for the discount | | | | interest amount | | | | calculated by the | | | | user or EE. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Discount Interest | | Specify the discount | | | | interest amount | | | | (i.e., input by the | | | | user or EE and not by | | | | eLOAN). | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Discount Base | | Specify the discount | | Interest | | base interest amount. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Customer Paid | | This refers to the | | Currency | | currency of the | | | | amount to be paid by | | | | the customer. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | This is for | | | | commission use – | | | | commission accrual | | | | and amortization. The | | | | commission can be | | | | paid at any time and | | | | in any currency. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Customer Paid | | This refers to the | | Interest | | commission amount to | | | | be paid in the | | | | Customer Paid | | | | Currency. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Customer Paid | | This refers to the | | Equivalence | | commission amount to | | | | be paid in the | | | | Discount Local | | | | Currency. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image193. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Amortization | | | | Functions > | | | | Amortization TakeDown | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Amortization | | ![](./media/image194. | | Takedown function | | png){width="3.5in” | | screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | details in the fields | | | | provided. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Click on the | | ![](./media/image195. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="5.34722222222 | | | | 2222e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image196. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To add another | | | | record, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Amortization Payment

This function is used for processing the payment of the loan amount. As the interest has already been subtracted from the principal amount upon the creation of the loan, only the transaction amount must be paid for on the due date.

Figure 4. 2 Amortization Payment Function

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This refers to the | | | | business unit for | | | | which the transaction | | | | is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | This field refers to | | | | the module that is | | | | associated with the | | | | transaction. This is | | | | used for tracking the | | | | origin of the loan in | | | | case it is connected | | | | to other trade | | | | transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Value | | This refers to the | | Date | | date on which the | | | | transaction is made. | | | | This must not be | | | | later than the | | | | initial takedown date | | | | of the transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction | | This refers to the | | Amount | | amount of the paid | | | | principal. The field | | | | must have a positive | | | | value. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Refund Interest | | Specify the amount of | | Amount | | paid interest that is | | | | to be refunded (i.e., | | | | input by the user or | | | | EE and not by eLOAN). | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Discount Local | | This is the currency | | Currency | | of the Refund | | | | Interest Amount. It | | | | is used for the | | | | refund interest | | | | amount calculated by | | | | the user or EE. The | | | | initial value is the | | | | currency specified | | | | during amortization | | | | takedown. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Refund Base | | Specify the amount of | | Interest Amount | | the base interest | | | | that is to be | | | | refunded. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | This refers to the | | | | account type for the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Calculated | | This refers to the | | Interest | | refund interest | | | | amount calculated by | | | | eLOAN. To calculate | | | | this amount, click on | | | | the Get Int button. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | If the amount is not | | | | calculated by eLOAN, | | | | this field is | | | | protected. The Get | | | | Int button is also | | | | disabled. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Calculated | | This refers to the | | Base Interest | | total calculated | | | | interest based on the | | | | defined base rate. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Customer Paid | | This refers to the | | Currency | | currency of the | | | | amount to be paid by | | | | the customer. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | This is for | | | | commission use – | | | | commission accrual | | | | and amortization. The | | | | commission can be | | | | paid at any time and | | | | in any currency. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Customer Paid | | This refers to the | | Interest | | commission amount to | | | | be paid in the | | | | Customer Paid | | | | Currency. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Customer Paid | | This refers to the | | Equivalence | | commission amount to | | | | be paid in the | | | | Discount Local | | | | Currency. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Posted | | This refers to the | | Interest Amount | | total posted interest | | (FCY) | | from the indicated | | | | period. The Get | | | | Posted Int button is | | | | used to calculate | | | | this amount. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Posted | | This refers to the | | Interest Amount | | total calculated | | (LCY) | | interest (Local CCY) | | | | from the indicated | | | | period. The Get | | | | Posted Int button is | | | | used to calculate | | | | this amount. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image198. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Amortization | | | | Functions > | | | | Amortization Payment | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Amortization | | ![](./media/image199. | | Payment function | | png){width="3.5in” | | catalog screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Main Ref. No. | | | | (Main Reference | | | | Number) field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image200. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Amortization | | ![](./media/image201. | | Payment function | | png){width="3.5in” | | screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | details. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image202. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="5.06944444444 | | | | 44445e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image203. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To run the function | | | | again, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Amortization Retakedown

This function is used for increasing the original loan amount.

Figure 4. 3 Amortization Retakedown Function

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This is the business | | | | unit for which the | | | | transaction is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | This field refers to | | | | the module that is | | | | associated with the | | | | transaction. This is | | | | used for tracking the | | | | origin of the loan in | | | | case it is connected | | | | to other trade | | | | transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Value | | This refers to the | | Date | | date on which the | | | | transaction is made. | | | | | | | | This must not be | | | | later than the | | | | initial takedown date | | | | of the transaction. | | | | The date may be | | | | defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Discount Local | | This is the currency | | Currency | | of the directly | | | | discounted interest | | | | amount. It is used | | | | for the discount | | | | interest amount | | | | calculated by the | | | | user or EE. The value | | | | is retrieved from | | | | amortization | | | | takedown. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Discount Interest | | This refers to the | | | | discount interest | | | | amount calculated by | | | | the user or EE (and | | | | not eLOAN). | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | This refers to the | | | | account type of the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Discount Base | | Specify the discount | | Interest | | base interest amount. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction | | This refers to the Re | | Amount | | Takedown amount. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Calculated | | This refers to the | | Interest | | discount interest | | | | amount calculated by | | | | eLOAN. To calculate | | | | this amount, click on | | | | the Get Int button. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | If the amount is not | | | | calculated by eLOAN, | | | | this field is | | | | protected. The Get | | | | Int button is also | | | | disabled. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Calculated | | This refers to the | | Base Interest | | total calculated | | | | interest based on the | | | | defined base rate. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Customer Paid | | This refers to the | | Currency | | currency of the | | | | amount to be paid by | | | | the customer. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | This is for | | | | commission use – | | | | commission accrual | | | | and amortization. The | | | | commission can be | | | | paid at any time and | | | | in any currency. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Customer Paid | | This refers to the | | Interest | | commission amount to | | | | be paid in the | | | | Customer Paid | | | | Currency. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Customer Paid | | This refers to the | | Equivalence | | commission amount to | | | | be paid in the | | | | Discount Local | | | | Currency. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image205. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Amortization | | | | Functions > | | | | Amortization | | | | ReTakedown | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Amortization | | ![](./media/image206. | | ReTakedown function | | png){width="3.5in” | | catalog screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Main Ref. No. | | | | (Main Reference | | | | Number) field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image207. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Amortization | | ![](./media/image208. | | ReTakedown function | | png){width="3.5in” | | screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | details. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image202. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="5.06944444444 | | | | 44445e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image209. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To run the function | | | | again, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Amortization Extend and Shorten

This function is used for extending or shortening the due date of the loan amount.

{width="0.3333333333333333in” height="0.3333333333333333in”}NOTE:

i. Shorten eLOAN Event Type: The New Due Date is earlier than the original Due Date.

ii. Extend eLOAN Event Type: The New Due Date is later than the original Due Date.

Figure 4. 4 Amortization Extend and Shorten Function

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This refers to the | | | | business unit for | | | | which the transaction | | | | is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | Indicate the | | | | four-character code | | | | for the module where | | | | this transaction is | | | | to be connected. This | | | | is used to track the | | | | origin of the loan in | | | | case it is connected | | | | to other trade | | | | transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Extend Rate | | If the due date is | | | | extended, specify the | | | | extend rate that is | | | | to be applied in | | | | computing the | | | | interest for the | | | | extended period. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The | | | | IA_EXTEND_RATE_FLA | | | | G | | | | eLOAN system | | | | parameter controls | | | | whether or not the | | | | extension rate covers | | | | the Base Rate and | | | | Spread Rate after the | | | | extension rate. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | a | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Discount Local | | This is the currency | | Currency | | of the Discount or | | | | Refund Interest | | | | Amount. It is used | | | | for the discount or | | | | refund interest | | | | amount calculated by | | | | the user or EE. The | | | | value is retrieved | | | | from amortization | | | | takedown. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Discount/Refund | | This refers to the | | Interest | | discount or refund | | | | interest amount | | | | calculated by the | | | | user or EE (and not | | | | eLOAN). | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | This refers to the | | | | account type for the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Discount/ Refund | | This refers to the | | Base Interest | | discount or refund | | | | base interest. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **Transaction Value | | Specify the | | Date ** | | transaction value | | | | date. This must be | | | | the same as or later | | | | than the takedown | | | | date. The date may be | | | | defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | For extensions: If | | | | the transaction value | | | | date is earlier than | | | | the original due | | | | date, this extension | | | | event is made | | | | effective from the | | | | original due date. If | | | | the transaction value | | | | date is equal to or | | | | later than the | | | | original due date, | | | | this extension event | | | | is made effective | | | | from the transaction | | | | value date. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | New Due Date | | This refers to the | | | | new due date of the | | | | loan amount. The date | | | | may be changed using | | | | the calendar function | | | | that is provided with | | | | this field. The value | | | | of this date must not | | | | be the same as the | | | | original due date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Calculated | | This refers to the | | Interest | | discount or refund | | | | interest amount | | | | calculated by eLOAN. | | | | To calculate this | | | | amount, click on the | | | | Get Int button. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | If the amount is not | | | | calculated by eLOAN, | | | | this field is | | | | protected. The Get | | | | Int button is also | | | | disabled. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Calculated | | This refers to the | | Base Interest | | total calculated | | | | interest based on the | | | | defined base rate. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Customer Paid | | This refers to the | | Currency | | currency of the | | | | amount to be paid by | | | | the customer. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | This is for | | | | commission use – | | | | commission accrual | | | | and amortization. The | | | | commission can be | | | | paid at any time and | | | | in any currency. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Customer Paid | | This refers to the | | Interest | | commission amount to | | | | be paid in the | | | | Customer Paid | | | | Currency. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Customer Paid | | This refers to the | | Equivalence | | commission amount to | | | | be paid in the | | | | Discount Local | | | | Currency. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image211. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Transaction > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Amortization | | | | Functions > | | | | Amortization | | | | Extend&Shorten | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Amortization | | ![](./media/image212. | | Extend and Shorten | | png){width="3.5in” | | function catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Main Ref. No. | | | | (Main Reference | | | | Number) field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image213. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Amortization | | ![](./media/image214. | | Extend and Shorten | | png){width="3.5in” | | function screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | information. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image215. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="5.34722222222 | | | | 2222e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image216. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To run the function | | | | again, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Amortization Amend

This function is used for amending the details of an amortization transaction.

Figure 4. 5 Amortization Amend Function

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Reference No | | This is the unique | | | | reference number of | | | | the selected | | | | transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Unit Code | | This refers to the | | | | business unit for | | | | which the transaction | | | | is made. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Module Name | | This field refers to | | | | the module that is | | | | associated with the | | | | transaction. This is | | | | used for tracking the | | | | origin of the loan in | | | | case it is connected | | | | to other trade | | | | transactions or | | | | modules. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Base Days | | This field is used in | | | | calculating interests | | | | on the basis of | | | | amortization. | | | | | | | | If no value is | | | | specified, the system | | | | automatically | | | | retrieves the Base | | | | Days value of the | | | | transaction currency | | | | code. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Discount Local | | This refers to the | | Currency | | currency that is to | | | | be used in generating | | | | the voucher. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction | | This refers to the | | Amount | | takedown or Pay | | | | Principal amount. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Refund Interest | | This is refers to the | | Amount | | refund interest | | | | amount calculated by | | | | the user or EE (and | | | | not eLOAN). | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Discount Interest | | This is refers to the | | | | discount interest | | | | amount calculated by | | | | the user or EE (and | | | | not eLOAN). | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Refund Base | | Specify the amount of | | Interest Amount | | the base interest | | | | that is to be | | | | refunded. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Discount Base | | Specify the discount | | Interest | | base interest. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Value | | This refers to the | | Date | | date on which the | | | | transaction is made. | | | | This must not be | | | | later than the | | | | initial takedown date | | | | of the transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Due Date | | Specify the new due | | | | date of the loan | | | | amount. The date may | | | | be defined using the | | | | calendar function | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Account Type | | This refers to the | | | | account type for the | | | | Borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | protected. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Calculated | | This refers to the | | Interest | | discount or refund | | | | interest amount | | | | calculated by eLOAN. | | | | To calculate this | | | | amount, click on the | | | | Get Int button. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | If the amount is not | | | | calculated by eLOAN, | | | | this field is | | | | protected. The Get | | | | Int button is also | | | | disabled. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Total Calculated | | This refers to the | | Base Interest | | total calculated | | | | interest based on the | | | | defined base rate. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Customer Paid | | This refers to the | | Currency | | currency of the | | | | amount to be paid by | | | | the customer. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | This is for | | | | commission use – | | | | commission accrual | | | | and amortization. The | | | | commission can be | | | | paid at any time and | | | | in any currency. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Customer Paid | | This refers to the | | Interest | | commission amount to | | | | be paid in the | | | | Customer Paid | | | | Currency. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Customer Paid | | This refers to the | | Equivalence | | commission amount to | | | | be paid in the | | | | Discount Local | | | | Currency. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

No. | | | | (Main Reference | | | | Number) field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3.
