This is | | | | > the "to" date. | | | | > For a bond trade, | | | | > this is the | | | | > settlement date of | | | | > the trade. | | | | > | | | | > Date3 (Y3.M3.D3): | | | | > This is the | | | | > coupon payment | | | | > date, which follow | | | | > Date2. | | | | > | | | | > Freq: This is | | | | > the coupon | | | | > payment frequency. | | | | > (e.g., 1 = annual, | | | | > 2 = semi-annual, 4 | | | | > = quarterly, 12 = | | | | > monthly) | | | | > | | | | > Days(StartDate, | | | | > EndDate): This | | | | > specifies a month | | | | > as 30 days, and | | | | > returns the number | | | | > of days between the | | | | > start date and end | | | | > date. | | | | > | | | | > Example: | | | | | | | | Start Date（G11） D | | | | 1（I11） =IF(DAY(G11) | | | | =31,30,DAY(G11)) | | | | ——————- | | | | ———– ——– | | | | ——————— | | | | ——————— | | | | ——————— | | | | – | | | | End Date （H11） D | | | | 2（J11） =IF(AND(DAY( | | | | H11)=31,(OR(DAY(G11)= | | | | 31,DAY(G11)=30))),30, | | | | MIN(DAY(H11),31)) | | | | Days Count | | | | =(YEAR(H | | | | 11)-YEAR(G11))*360+( | | | | MONTH(H11)-MONTH(G11) | | | | )*30+(J11-I11) | | | | | | | | - 30/ACT-AFB | | | | | | | | > The interest is | | | | > calculated as | | | | > follows. | | | | | | | | Interest = Principal | | | | * Coupon Rate * | | | | Factor | | | | | | | | Factor = Days (Date1, | | | | Date2) | | | | | | | | > DiY | | | | > | | | | > Where: | | | | > | | | | > Date1 (Y1.M1.D1): | | | | > The start date | | | | > for the accrual. | | | | > This is usually the | | | | > coupon payment date | | | | > preceding Date2. | | | | > This is the “from” | | | | > date. | | | | > | | | | > Date2 (Y2.M2.D2): | | | | > This is the date | | | | > through which | | | | > interest is being | | | | > accrued. This is | | | | > the "to" date. | | | | > For a bond trade, | | | | > this is the | | | | > settlement date of | | | | > the trade. | | | | > | | | | > DiY: This is | | | | > equal to 365 (if | | | | > the calculation | | | | > period does not | | | | > contain 29th | | | | > February) or 366 | | | | > (if 29 February | | | | > falls within the | | | | > Calculation Period | | | | > or Compounding | | | | > Period). | | | | > | | | | > If the Calculation | | | | > Period or | | | | > Compounding Period | | | | > is a term of more | | | | > than one year, the | | | | > basis must be | | | | > calculated as | | | | > follows: | | | | | | | | - the number of | | | | > complete years | | | | > must be counted | | | | > back from the | | | | > last day of the | | | | > Calculation | | | | > Period or | | | | > Compounding | | | | > Period; and | | | | | | | | - this number must | | | | > be increased by | | | | > the fraction | | | | > for the | | | | > relevant period | | | | > calculated. | | | | | | | | > When counting | | | | > backwards for this | | | | > purpose, if the | | | | > last day of the | | | | > relevant period is | | | | > 28th February, the | | | | > full year must be | | | | > counted back to the | | | | > previous 28th | | | | > February unless | | | | > 29th February | | | | > exists, in which | | | | > case, 29th February | | | | > must be used. | | | | > | | | | > Days(StartDate, | | | | > EndDate): This | | | | > specifies a month | | | | > as 30 days, and | | | | > returns the number | | | | > of days between the | | | | > start date and end | | | | > date. | | | | > | | | | > Example: | | | | | | | | Start Date（G11） D | | | | 1（I11） =IF(DAY(G11) | | | | =31,30,DAY(G11)) | | | | ——————- | | | | ———– ——– | | | | ——————— | | | | ——————— | | | | ——————— | | | | – | | | | End Date （H11） D | | | | 2（J11） =IF(AND(DAY( | | | | H11)=31,(OR(DAY(G11)= | | | | 31,DAY(G11)=30))),30, | | | | MIN(DAY(H11),31)) | | | | Days Count | | | | =(YEAR(H | | | | 11)-YEAR(G11))*360+( | | | | MONTH(H11)-MONTH(G11) | | | | )*30+(J11-I11) | | | | | | | | - 30/360 | | | | | | | | > The interest is | | | | > calculated as | | | | > follows. | | | | | | | | Interest = Principal | | | | * Coupon Rate * | | | | Factor | | | | | | | | Factor = Days (Date1, | | | | Date2) | | | | | | | | > 360 | | | | > | | | | > Where: | | | | > | | | | > Date1 (Y1.M1.D1): | | | | > The start date | | | | > for the accrual. | | | | > This is usually the | | | | > coupon payment date | | | | > preceding Date2. | | | | > This is the “from” | | | | > date. | | | | > | | | | > Date2 (Y2.M2.D2): | | | | > This is the date | | | | > through which | | | | > interest is being | | | | > accrued. This is | | | | > the "to" date. | | | | > For a bond trade, | | | | > this is the | | | | > settlement date of | | | | > the trade. | | | | > | | | | > Days(StartDate, | | | | > EndDate): This | | | | > specifies a month | | | | > as 30 days, and | | | | > returns the number | | | | > of days between the | | | | > start date and end | | | | > date. | | | | > | | | | > Example: | | | | | | | | Start Date（G11） D | | | | 1（I11） =IF(DAY(G11) | | | | =31,30,DAY(G11)) | | | | ——————- | | | | ———– ——– | | | | ——————— | | | | ——————— | | | | ——————— | | | | – | | | | End Date （H11） D | | | | 2（J11） =IF(AND(DAY( | | | | H11)=31,(OR(DAY(G11)= | | | | 31,DAY(G11)=30))),30, | | | | MIN(DAY(H11),31)) | | | | Days Count | | | | =(YEAR(H | | | | 11)-YEAR(G11))*360+( | | | | MONTH(H11)-MONTH(G11) | | | | )*30+(J11-I11) | | | | | | | | > [NOTE:]{.underlin | | | | e} | | | | > | | | | > In the 30/360 base | | | | > type, the 31st day | | | | > of the month is | | | | > counted as zero. | | | | | | | | - For a month with | | | | > 31 days, if the | | | | > interest is | | | | > paid on the | | | | > 31st, only the | | | | > interest for 30 | | | | > days is | | | | > calculated. | | | | | | | | - For a month with | | | | > 31 days, if the | | | | > interest is | | | | > paid on the 1st | | | | > day of the | | | | > succeeding | | | | > month, only the | | | | > interest for 30 | | | | > days is | | | | > calculated. | | | | | | | | - For a month with | | | | > 30 days, if the | | | | > interest is | | | | > paid on the | | | | > 30th, only the | | | | > interest for 29 | | | | > days is | | | | > calculated. | | | | | | | | - For a month with | | | | > 30 days, if the | | | | > interest is | | | | > paid on the 1st | | | | > day of the | | | | > succeeding | | | | > month, only the | | | | > interest for 30 | | | | > days is | | | | > calculated. | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | - 30/365 | | | | | | | | > The interest is | | | | > calculated as | | | | > follows. | | | | | | | | Interest = Principal | | | | * Coupon Rate * | | | | Factor | | | | | | | | Factor = Days (Date1, | | | | Date2) | | | | | | | | > 365 | | | | > | | | | > Where: | | | | > | | | | > Date1 (Y1.M1.D1): | | | | > The start date | | | | > for the accrual. | | | | > This is usually the | | | | > coupon payment date | | | | > preceding Date2. | | | | > This is the “from” | | | | > date. | | | | > | | | | > Date2 (Y2.M2.D2): | | | | > This is the date | | | | > through which | | | | > interest is being | | | | > accrued. This is | | | | > the "to" date. | | | | > For a bond trade, | | | | > this is the | | | | > settlement date of | | | | > the trade. | | | | > | | | | > Days(StartDate, | | | | > EndDate): This | | | | > specifies a month | | | | > as 30 days, and | | | | > returns the number | | | | > of days between the | | | | > start date and end | | | | > date. | | | | > | | | | > Example: | | | | | | | | Start Date（G11） D | | | | 1（I11） =IF(DAY(G11) | | | | =31,30,DAY(G11)) | | | | ——————- | | | | ———– ——– | | | | ——————— | | | | ——————— | | | | ——————— | | | | – | | | | End Date （H11） D | | | | 2（J11） =IF(AND(DAY( | | | | H11)=31,(OR(DAY(G11)= | | | | 31,DAY(G11)=30))),30, | | | | MIN(DAY(H11),31)) | | | | Days Count | | | | =(YEAR(H | | | | 11)-YEAR(G11))*360+( | | | | MONTH(H11)-MONTH(G11) | | | | )*30+(J11-I11) | | | | | | | | - ACT/365 Fix | | | | | | | | > The interest is | | | | > calculated as | | | | > follows. | | | | | | | | Interest = Principal | | | | * Coupon Rate * | | | | Factor | | | | | | | | Factor = Days (Date1, | | | | Date2) | | | | | | | | > 365 | | | | > | | | | > Where: | | | | > | | | | > Days(StartDate, | | | | > EndDate): This is | | | | > the number of | | | | > days between the | | | | > start date and end | | | | > date on a Julian | | | | > basis (i.e., all | | | | > days are counted). | | | | > Example: Days(15 | | | | > October 2007, 15 | | | | > November 2007) . | | | | > The number of days | | | | > is 31. | | | | | | | | - ACT/360 | | | | | | | | > The interest is | | | | > calculated as | | | | > follows. | | | | | | | | Interest = Principal | | | | * Coupon Rate * | | | | Factor | | | | | | | | Factor = Days (Date1, | | | | Date2) | | | | | | | | > 360 | | | | > | | | | > Where: | | | | > | | | | > Days(StartDate, | | | | > EndDate): This is | | | | > the number of | | | | > days between the | | | | > start date and end | | | | > date on a Julian | | | | > basis (i.e., all | | | | > days are counted). | | | | > Example: Days(15 | | | | > October 2007, 15 | | | | > November 2007) . | | | | > The number of days | | | | > is 31. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Posting Frequency | | Specify the frequency | | | | of posting loans for | | | | this account type. | | | | | | | | This follows the | | | | format ‘CMNN’. Refer | | | | to the [Posting | | | | Frequency | | | | Format](#posting_freq | | | | _format) | | | | discussion for more | | | | information on the | | | | value to be specified | | | | for this field. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Spread Rate | | Base Rates and Spread | | Operand | | Rates can be added to | | | | (+), subtracted from | | | | (-), or multiplied | | | | with (*) each other. | | | | | | | | The interest rate is | | | | calculated as | | | | follows: | | | | | | | | - + : Interest | | | | Rate = Base | | | | Rate + Spread | | | | Rate | | | | | | | | - - : Interest | | | | Rate = Base | | | | Rate - Spread | | | | Rate | | | | | | | | - * : Interest | | | | Rate = Base | | | | Rate + Base | | | | Rate * | | | | | | | | > Spread Rate | | | | | | | | Select the spread | | | | rate operand from the | | | | dropdown list: | | | | | | | | - + | | | | | | | | - - | | | | | | | | - * | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Grace Days | | This indicates the | | | | allowed grace days | | | | for the account. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Max. Times of | | Specify the maximum | | Delay | | number of payment | | | | delays that are | | | | allowed to a | | | | borrower. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Penalty Days | | For each instance of | | | | delay, specify the | | | | number of days given | | | | to a borrower to make | | | | the payment before | | | | penalty is incurred. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Penalty Operand & | | This field determines | | Spread R****ate | | if penalty is to be | | | | calculated based on | | | | principal, interest, | | | | or principal and | | | | interest. | | | | | | | | Select the spread | | | | rate operand from the | | | | dropdown list: | | | | | | | | - + | | | | | | | | - * | | | | | | | | The penalty interest | | | | is calculated as | | | | follows. | | | | | | | | Rate = Base Rate + | | | | Spread Rate + | | | | (Penalty Operand) | | | | Penalty Spread Rate | | | | | | | | - When the penalty | | | | operand is (+): | | | | | | | | > Rate = Base Rate + | | | | > Spread Rate + | | | | > Penalty Spread Rate | | | | | | | | - When the penalty | | | | operand is (*): | | | | | | | | > Rate = Base Rate + | | | | > Spread Rate + (Base | | | | > Rate + Spread Rate) | | | | > * Penalty Spread | | | | > Rate | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Penalty Spread | | Specify the spread | | Rate | | rate that is added to | | | | the interest rate if | | | | the loan is not | | | | settled on the | | | | maturity date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Generate Penalty | | This flag is used to | | for Unpaid | | indicate whether | | Principal | | penalty must be | | | | assigned for the | | | | unpaid principal. | | | | This flag may only be | | | | set when the | | | | corresponding Pay | | | | Principal Date field | | | | has been given a | | | | value. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | eLOAN always | | | | generates penalty | | | | based on the unpaid | | | | principal. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Generate Penalty | | This is reserved for | | for Unpaid Interest | | future use. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Flag of Posting | | Select the relevant | | Total Unpaid Int for | | option from the | | Accrual | | dropdown list: | | | | | | | | - 0: Post un-post | | | | interest till | | | | current date | | | | | | | | - 1: Post unpaid | | | | interest till | | | | current date | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Flag of Posting | | Select the relevant | | Total Amortized Int | | option from the | | for Amortization | | dropdown list: | | | | | | | | - 0: Post | | | | un-amortized | | | | interest till | | | | current date | | | | | | | | - 1: Post total | | | | amortized | | | | interest till | | | | current date | | | | | | | | - 2: Post Total not | | | | yet amortized | | | | interest | | | | | | | | - 3: Post A/A int | | | | till current date | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | A/A denotes that both | | | | accrual and | | | | amortization interest | | | | are posted for the | | | | same transaction. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Generate Reverse | | Select the relevant | | Entries Flag | | option from the | | | | dropdown list: | | | | | | | | - 0: None | | | | | | | | - 1: With Value | | | | Date of Next Date | | | | | | | | - 2: With Value | | | | Date of Next | | | | Working Date | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Generate Posting | | Select the relevant | | After OverDue | | option from the | | | | dropdown list: | | | | | | | | - N: Will not | | | | generate posting | | | | after overdue. | | | | | | | | - Y: Will generate | | | | posting after | | | | overdue. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | If this option is set | | | | to Y, eLOAN vouchers | | | | are generated despite | | | | an overdue posting | | | | date. Otherwise, if | | | | set to N, eLOAN | | | | vouchers are not | | | | generated once the | | | | posting date is | | | | overdue. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Generate Reverse | | Select the relevant | | Entries for Back | | option from the | | Value | | dropdown list: | | | | | | | | - N: Will not | | | | generate reverse | | | | entries for back | | | | value. | | | | | | | | - Y: Will generate | | | | reverse entries | | | | for back value. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Generate Normal | | Select the relevant | | Entries for Before | | option from the | | Business Date | | dropdown list: | | | | | | | | - N: Will not | | | | generate normal | | | | entries for | | | | before business | | | | date. | | | | | | | | - Y: Will generate | | | | normal entries | | | | for before | | | | business date. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Loan or Deposit | | Select the relevant | | | | option to indicate | | | | the arrangement of | | | | debit and credit | | | | entries in the | | | | generated voucher. | | | | Any of the following | | | | options may be | | | | selected: | | | | | | | | - Loan | | | | | | | | - Deposit | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | If the Account Type | | | | is set as Loan, debit | | | | entries precede | | | | credit entries in the | | | | generated voucher. | | | | | | | | ![](./media/image352. | | | | png){width="4.1597222 | | | | 22222222in” | | | | height="0.98125in”} | | | | | | | | If the Account Type | | | | is set as Deposit, | | | | credit entries | | | | precede debit entries | | | | in the generated | | | | voucher. | | | | | | | | ![](./media/image353. | | | | png){width="4.1597222 | | | | 22222222in” | | | | height="0.90694444444 | | | | 44444in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Merging | | When this flag is | | Amortization | | marked and the amount | | transaction with | | of the Amortization | | unpaid principal into | | transaction remains | | Accrual automatically | | unpaid or is not paid | | on or after Due | | on the due date, | | Date | | eLOAN automatically | | | | merges this | | | | transaction into the | | | | Accrual transaction. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | To Another Account | | After the conversion | | Type | | of the Amortization | | | | to Accrual | | | | transaction, the new | | | | account type can be | | | | selected from the | | | | dropdown list. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | []{#posting_freq_form | | | | at | | | | .anchor}Posting | | | | Frequency Format | | | | | | | | The value to be | | | | specified in the | | | | Posting Frequency | | | | field must follow the | | | | ‘CMNN’ format. The | | | | following table | | | | illustrates the | | | | process of using this | | | | format. | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | Coupon Fr | | | | equency | | | | Details</ | | | | strong> | | | | C</strong | | | | > | | | | M</strong | | | | > | | | | NN</stron | | | | g> | | | | Descripti | | | | on | | | | | | | | | | | | Annual | | | | JAN | | | | Y | | | | 1 | | | | 01-31(Day of the | | | | month) | | | | On a specified da | | | | y of specified months | | | | in a year | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | FEB | | | | Y | | | | 2 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | MAR | | | | Y | | | | 3 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | APR | | | | Y | | | | 4 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | MAY | | | | Y | | | | 5 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | JUN | | | | Y | | | | 6 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | JUL | | | | Y | | | | 7 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | AUG | | | | Y | | | | 8 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | SEP | | | | Y | | | | 9 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | OCT | | | | Y | | | | A | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | NOV | | | | Y | | | | B | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | DEC | | | | Y | | | | C | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | Semi-Annual | | | | JAN JUL | | | | H | | | | 1 | | | | 01-31(Day of the | | | | month) | | | | On a specified da | | | | y of specified semian | | | | nual months | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | FEB AUG | | | | H | | | | 2 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | MAR SEP | | | | H | | | | 3 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | APR OCT | | | | H | | | | 4 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | MAY NOV | | | | H | | | | 5 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | JUN DEC | | | | H | | | | 6 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | Quarterly | | | | JAN APR JUL OCT</ | | | | td> | | | | Q | | | | 1 | | | | 01-31(Day of the | | | | month) | | | | On a specified da | | | | y of specified months | | | | in a quarter | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | FEB MAY AUG NOV</ | | | | td> | | | | Q | | | | 2 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | MAR JUN SEP DEC</ | | | | td> | | | | Q | | | | 3 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | Big-Monthly | | | | | | | | B | | | | 0 | | | | 01-31 (Day of the | | | | month) | | | | On a specified da | | | | y, once two months</t | | | | d> | | | | | | | | | | | | Monthly | | | | | | | | M | | | | 0 | | | | 01-31 (Day of the | | | | month) | | | | On a specified da | | | | y, once a month | | | | | | | | | | | | Weekly | | | | | | | | W | | | | 0 | | | | 01-07 (Day of | | | | the week) | | | | Weekly Expression: | | | | | | | | 01 – Monday; | | | | 02 – Tuesday; | | | | 03 – Wednesday;</p | | | | > | | | | 04 – Thursday; | | | | 05 – Friday; | | | | 06 – Saturday; | | | | 07 – Sunday;</ | | | | td> | | | | On a specified da | | | | y, once a week | | | | | | | | | | | | Daily | | | | | | | | D | | | | 0 | | | | 01 | | | | Every day | | | | | | | | | | | | At Maturity | | | | | | | | A | | | | 0 | | | | 0 | | | | On the due date</ | | | | td> | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underli | | | | ne} | | | | | | | | Coupon Frequency = | | | | Quarterly | | | | | | | | Last Coupon Payment | | | | Date = April 17 | | | | | | | | Scope of Months | | | | (Quarterly) = Mar – | | | | June | | | | | | | | The Format is CMNN: Q | | | | (Quarterly) + 3 | | | | (Mar-June) + 17 | | | | (April 17). | | | | | | | | Therefore, the | | | | posting frequency is | | | | Q317. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

[eLOAN Voucher Tab]{.underline}

The following fields are provided in this tab.

Figure A. 4 eLOAN Account Type - eLOAN Voucher Tab

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Transaction Code | | This is used for | | | | providing additional | | | | information in the | | | | posted voucher. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Customer Code | | This is used for | | | | providing additional | | | | information in the | | | | posted voucher. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

[Additional Account Tab]{.underline}

The following fields are provided in this tab.

Figure A. 5 eLOAN Account Type – Additional Account Tab

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Post Exchange | | Specify what is to be | | Entry | | included in the Post | | | | Exchange entry. The | | | | options in the | | | | dropdown list are: | | | | | | | | - Total Only | | | | | | | | - Base Only | | | | | | | | - Spread Only | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Separate Interest | | Specify the | | Into Different | | instruction whether | | Account | | to calculate the base | | | | rate interest and | | | | total interest into | | | | different accounts. | | | | The options are: | | | | | | | | - Total Only | | | | | | | | - Total + Base | | | | | | | | - Total + Spread | | | | | | | | - Total + Base + | | | | Spread | | | | | | | | - Base + Spread | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Separate Interest | | Specify whether the | | Into Different | | interest is to be | | Account After Due | | seprated into | | Date | | different accounts | | | | after the due date. | | | | The options are: No | | | | and Yes. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Interest Base | | Specify the debit | | Receivable A/C No | | account number for | | | | the interest base in | | Description | | the Interest Base | | | | Receivable A/C No | | | | field. The browse | | | | button that | | | | accompanies this | | | | field may be used to | | | | retrieve the account | | | | number from the | | | | Account table. | | | | | | | | Provide a description | | | | of this account | | | | number in the | | | | corresponding | | | | Description field. | | | | | | | | These fields are | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Interest Spread | | Specify the debit | | Receivable A/C No | | account number for | | | | the interest spread | | Description | | in the Interest | | | | Spread Receivable A/C | | | | No field. The browse | | | | button that | | | | accompanies this | | | | field may be used to | | | | retrieve the account | | | | number from the | | | | Account table. | | | | | | | | Provide a description | | | | of this account | | | | number in the | | | | corresponding | | | | Description field. | | | | | | | | These fields are | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Interest Base | | Specify the account | | Income A/C No | | number for the | | | | calculated base | | Description | | interest in the | | | | Interest Base Income | | | | A/C No field. The | | | | browse button that | | | | accompanies this | | | | field may be used to | | | | retrieve the account | | | | number from the | | | | Account table. | | | | | | | | Provide a description | | | | of this account | | | | number in the | | | | corresponding | | | | Description field. | | | | | | | | These fields are | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Interest Spread | | Specify the account | | Income A/C No | | number for the | | | | calculated interest | | Description | | spread in the | | | | Interest Spread | | | | Income A/C No field. | | | | The browse button | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field may be used to | | | | retrieve the account | | | | number from the | | | | Account table. | | | | | | | | Provide a description | | | | of this account | | | | number in the | | | | corresponding | | | | Description field. | | | | | | | | These fields are | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Deferred Base | | Specify the debit | | Payment A/C No | | account number for | | | | the deferred base | | Description | | payment in the | | | | Deferred Base Payment | | | | A/C No field. The | | | | browse button that | | | | accompanies this | | | | field may be used to | | | | retrieve the account | | | | number from the | | | | Account table. | | | | | | | | Provide a description | | | | of this account | | | | number in the | | | | corresponding | | | | Description field. | | | | | | | | These fields are | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Deferred Spread | | Specify the debit | | Payment A/C No | | account number for | | | | the deferred spread | | Description | | payment in the | | | | Deferred Spread | | | | Payment A/C No field. | | | | The browse button | | | | that accompanies this | | | | field may be used to | | | | retrieve the account | | | | number from the | | | | Account table. | | | | | | | | Provide a description | | | | of this account | | | | number in the | | | | corresponding | | | | Description field. | | | | | | | | These fields are | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Penalty Interest | | Specify the account | | Base Income A/C No | | number for the | | | | delayed interest base | | Description | | income in the Penalty | | | | Interest Base Income | | | | A/C No field. The | | | | browse button that | | | | accompanies this | | | | field may be used to | | | | retrieve the account | | | | number from the | | | | Account table. | | | | | | | | Provide a description | | | | of this account | | | | number in the | | | | corresponding | | | | Description field. | | | | | | | | These fields are | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Penalty Interest | | Specify the account | | Spread Income A/C | | number for the | | No | | delayed interest | | | | spread income in the | | Description | | Penalty Interest | | | | Spread Income A/C No | | | | field. The browse | | | | button that | | | | accompanies this | | | | field may be used to | | | | retrieve the account | | | | number from the | | | | Account table. | | | | | | | | Provide a description | | | | of this account | | | | number in the | | | | corresponding | | | | Description field. | | | | | | | | These fields are | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image356. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Account Type | | | | Maintenance > Add | | | | eLOAN Account Type | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Add eLOAN | | ![](./media/image357. | | Account Type | | png){width="3.5in” | | function screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | information in the | | | | Account tab. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Specify the | | ![](./media/image358. | | relevant | | png){width="3.5in” | | information in the | | height="1.72361111111 | | Setting tab. | | 11112in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. Specify the | | ![](./media/image359. | | relevant | | png){width="3.5in” | | information in the | | height="1.72361111111 | | eLOAN Voucher tab. | | 11112in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Specify the | | ![](./media/image360. | | relevant | | png){width="3.5in” | | information in the | | height="1.72361111111 | | Additional Account | | 11112in”} | | tab. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. Click on the | | ![](./media/image361. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="5.83333333333 | | | | 33334e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 7. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image362. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To add another | | | | record, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

{#section-24 .CS-head2}

Edit eLOAN Account Type

This function is used for correcting or modifying eLOAN Account Type records. The original screen is displayed for modifying the account type details.

{width="0.3333333333333333in” height="0.3333333333333333in”}NOTE: Added eLOAN account records may only be edited once this record has been released.

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image363. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Account Type | | | | Maintenance > Edit | | | | eLOAN Account Type | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Edit eLOAN | | ![](./media/image364. | | Account Type | | png){width="3.5in” | | function catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Account Type Name | | | | field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image365. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Edit eLOAN | | ![](./media/image366. | | Account Type | | png){width="3.5in” | | function screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Modify the details as | | | | required. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image367. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="5.55555555555 | | | | 5555e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image368. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To edit another | | | | record, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

{#section-25 .CS-head2}

Delete eLOAN Account Type

This function is used for deleting an eLOAN account type.

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image369. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Account Type | | | | Maintenance > Delete | | | | eLOAN Account Type | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Delete eLOAN | | ![](./media/image370. | | Account Type | | png){width="3.5in” | | function catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Account Type Name | | | | field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. A list of | | ![](./media/image371. | | records is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To view the details | | | | of the record, select | | | | it from the list and | | | | click on the View | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | The record details | | ![](./media/image372. | | are shown on another | | png){width="3.5in” | | window. | | height="1.85694444444 | | | | 44445in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. To delete a | | ![](./media/image371. | | record, select it | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | list and click on | | 11112in”} | | the Delete button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | A message is | | ![](./media/image373. | | displayed confirming | | png){width="3.5in” | | the deletion. | | height="1.72569444444 | | | | 44444in”} | | Click on the OK | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image374. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To delete another | | | | record, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

{#section-26 .CS-head2}

Release eLOAN Account Type

This function is used for processing the release of eLOAN Account Type records that require the Release process. Such type of records may not be used in transaction operations until it is approved through this Release process.

This function only allows record detail viewing. No modification or change may be applied to the record through this function.

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image375. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Account Type | | | | Maintenance > | | | | Release eLOAN Account | | | | Type | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Release | | ![](./media/image376. | | eLOAN Account Type | | png){width="3.5in” | | function catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Account Type Name | | | | field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image377. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Release | | ![](./media/image378. | | eLOAN Account Type | | png){width="3.5in” | | function screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Review the given | | | | information. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. To release the | | ![](./media/image379. | | record, mark the | | png){width="3.5in” | | Release option. | | height="0.52708333333 | | | | 33333in”} | | To reject the record, | | | | mark the Refuse | | | | option. The reason | | | | for this rejection | | | | can be indicated in | | | | the field provided. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. Click on the | | ![](./media/image380. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="5.55555555555 | | | | 5555e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 7. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image381. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To release another | | | | record, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Inquire eLOAN Account Type

This function is used for inquiring master eLOAN Account Type records. No modification or change may be applied to the record through this function.

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image382. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Account Type | | | | Maintenance > | | | | Inquire eLOAN Account | | | | Type | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Inquire | | ![](./media/image383. | | eLOAN Account Type | | png){width="3.5in” | | function catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Account Type Name | | | | field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image384. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Click on the Master | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The record | | ![](./media/image385. | | details are shown | | png){width="3.4527559 | | on another window. | | 05511811in” | | | | height="1.83958333333 | | | | 33333in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

{#section-27 .CS-head2}

Unlock eLOAN Account Type

This function is used for unlocking an eLOAN Account Type record that has been held and locked for such reasons as system failure and processing errors, or if the record is being modified by another user**.** A locked record may only be used for processing after it is unlocked through this function

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image386. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Account Type | | | | Maintenance > Unlock | | | | eLOAN Account Type | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Unlock eLOAN | | ![](./media/image387. | | Account Type | | png){width="3.5in” | | function catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Account Type Name | | | | field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image388. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Click on the Confirm | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. A confirmation | | ![](./media/image389. | | message is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. Click on | | height="1.68541666666 | | the OK button to | | 66666in”} | | continue. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image390. | | Complete screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To unlock another | | | | record, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

eLOAN Rate Table Maintenance Functions

During trade finance transaction processing, the eLOAN sub-system retrieves the relevant floating rate Ids and floating rate numbers from the relevant eLOAN Rate Table.

The eLOAN Rate Table Maintenance function group consists of the following functions:

  • Add eLOAN Rate Table

  • Edit eLOAN Rate Table

  • Delete eLOAN Rate Table

  • Release eLOAN Rate Table

  • Inquire eLOAN Rate Table

  • Unlock eLOAN Rate Table

Add eLOAN Rate Table

The Add eLOAN Rate Table function is used for adding a floating rate table or an individual floating rate.

Configuration

[Main Screen ]{.underline}

The following fields are provided in the main function screen.

Figure A. 6 Add eLOAN Rate Table - Main Screen

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | Rate Table | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Rate Name | | Specify the rate name | | | | that is used to | | | | identify the rate | | | | table during loan | | | | transaction | | | | processing. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Rate Type | | Select the relevant | | | | rate type from the | | | | dropdown list: | | | | | | | | - Base Floating | | | | Rate, which | | | | pertains to the | | | | initial rate that | | | | changes or | | | | fluctuates | | | | throughout the | | | | term of the loan | | | | | | | | - Spread Floating | | | | Rate, which is | | | | either added to | | | | or subtracted | | | | from a rate to | | | | cover customer | | | | risk levels. | | | | Thus, the spread | | | | rate can either | | | | have a positive | | | | or a negative | | | | value. A spread | | | | rate may be | | | | defined according | | | | to the customer | | | | type and | | | | transaction type. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1MTH-Tier Day\ | | These fields are | | 2MTH-Tier Day\ | | reserved for future | | 3MTH-Tier Day\ | | use. | | 4MTH-Tier Day | | | | 5MTH-Tier Day\ | | | | 6MTH-Tier Day\ | | | | 7MTH-Tier Day\ | | | | 8MTH-Tier Day | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | Detail List | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | (Detail List) | | This Detail List | | | | section lists the | | | | entries added to the | | | | rate table. An entry | | | | consists of a value | | | | date and the | | | | corresponding rates | | | | for each tier. | | | | | | | | To add an entry to | | | | the table, click on | | | | the Add button and | | | | specify the details | | | | in the Rate Table | | | | window that is | | | | displayed. (The Edit | | | | and Delete buttons | | | | may be used to edit | | | | and delete any | | | | existing entries.) | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

[Rate Table Window]{.underline}

The Rate Table Window is displayed upon clicking on the Add or Edit button in the main function screen.

The following fields are provided in this window.

Figure A. 7 Add eLOAN Rate Table - Rate Table Window

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Value Date | | This refers to the | | | | start date on which | | | | the rate is applied. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **1MTH\ | | Specify the rate to | | 2MTH\ | | be applied starting | | 3MTH\ | | from the defined | | 4MTH\ | | value date. | | 5MTH\ | | | | 6MTH\ | | At most 8 rate values | | 7MTH\ | | can be specified. | | 8MTH\ | | | | ** | | These fields are | | | | optional. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The rate names (e.g., | | | | ‘1MTH’) can be | | | | defined in these | | | | eLOAN system | | | | parameters: | | | | IA_RATEDESC_MAP1, | | | | IA_RATEDESC_MAP2, | | | | IA_RATEDESC_MAP3, | | | | IA_RATEDESC_MAP4, | | | | IA_RATEDESC_MAP5, | | | | IA_RATEDESC_MAP6, | | | | IA_RATEDESC_MAP7, | | | | and | | | | IA_RATEDESC_MAP8. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image393. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Rate Table | | | | Maintenance > Add | | | | eLOAN Rate Table | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Add eLOAN | | ![](./media/image394. | | Rate Table function | | png){width="3.5in” | | screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Specify the relevant | | ![](./media/image395. | | information. | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | To assign the value | | 11112in”} | | dates and rates, | | | | click on the Add | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | The Rate Table window | | ![](./media/image396. | | is displayed. | | png){width="3.3958858 | | | | 267716536in” | | Specify the relevant | | height="2.22825240594 | | value date and rates. | | 92563in”} | | | | | | Click on the Save | | | | button to save the | | | | record. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Add as many | | ![](./media/image397. | | entries (value date | | png){width="3.5in” | | and rates) as | | height="1.72361111111 | | required. | | 11112in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. Click on the | | ![](./media/image398. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="5.83333333333 | | | | 33334e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image399. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To add another | | | | record, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

{#section-28 .CS-head2}

Edit eLOAN Rate Table

This function is used for correcting or modifying an eLOAN Rate Table record. The original screen is displayed for modifying the rate table details.

{width="0.3333333333333333in” height="0.3333333333333333in”}NOTE: A created eLOAN rate table record may not be modified unless this record has already been released.

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image400. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Rate Table | | | | Maintenance > Edit | | | | eLOAN Rate Table | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Edit eLOAN | | ![](./media/image401. | | Rate Table function | | png){width="3.5in” | | catalog screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Rate Name field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image402. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Edit eLOAN | | ![](./media/image403. | | Rate Table function | | png){width="3.5in” | | screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Modify the details as | | | | required. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image404. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="5.34722222222 | | | | 2222e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image405. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To edit another | | | | record, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Delete eLOAN Rate Table

This function is used for deleting a master eLOAN Rate Table record.

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image406. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Rate Table | | | | Maintenance > Delete | | | | eLOAN Rate Table | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Delete eLOAN | | ![](./media/image407. | | Rate Table function | | png){width="3.5in” | | catalog screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Rate Name field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. A list of | | ![](./media/image408. | | records is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | ![](./media/image409. | | ** | | png){width="3.4519860 | | | | 017497814in” | | To view the details | | height="1.84861111111 | | of the record, select | | 11112in”} | | it from the list and | | | | click on the View | | | | button. | | | | | | | | The record details | | | | are shown on another | | | | window. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. To delete a | | ![](./media/image408. | | record, select it | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | list and click on | | 11112in”} | | the Delete button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | A confirmation | | ![](./media/image410. | | message is displayed. | | png){width="3.5in” | | Click on the Ok | | height="1.72083333333 | | button. | | 33334in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image411. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To delete another | | | | record, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Release eLOAN Rate Table

This function is used for processing the release of eLOAN Rate Table records that require the Release process. Such type of records may not be used in transaction operations until it is approved through this Release process.

This function only allows record detail viewing. No modification or change may be applied to the record through this function.

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image412. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Rate Table | | | | Maintenance > | | | | Release eLOAN Rate | | | | Table | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Release | | ![](./media/image413. | | eLOAN Rate Table | | png){width="3.5in” | | function catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Rate Name field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image414. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Release | | ![](./media/image415. | | eLOAN Rate Table | | png){width="3.5in” | | function screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Review the given | | | | information. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. To release the | | ![](./media/image416. | | record, mark the | | png){width="3.5in” | | Release option. | | height="0.56458333333 | | | | 33333in”} | | To reject the record, | | | | mark the Refuse | | | | option. The reason | | | | for this rejection | | | | can be indicated in | | | | the field provided. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. Click on the | | ![](./media/image417. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="5.34722222222 | | | | 2222e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 7. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image418. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To release another | | | | record, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Inquire eLOAN Rate Table

This function is used for inquiring master eLOAN Rate Table records. No modification or change may be applied to the record through this function.

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image419. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Rate Table | | | | Maintenance > | | | | Inquire eLOAN Rate | | | | Table | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Inquire | | ![](./media/image420. | | eLOAN Rate Table | | png){width="3.5in” | | function catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Rate Name field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image421. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Click on the Master | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The record | | ![](./media/image422. | | details are shown | | png){width="3.4527777 | | on another window. | | 77777778in” | | | | height="1.84905730533 | | | | 68329in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Unlock eLOAN Rate Table

This function is used for unlocking an eLOAN Rate Table record that has been held and locked for such reasons as system failure and processing errors, or if the particular record is being modified by another user. A locked record may only be used for processing after it is unlocked through this function

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image423. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN Rate Table | | | | Maintenance > Unlock | | | | eLOAN Rate Table | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Unlock eLOAN | | ![](./media/image424. | | Rate Table function | | png){width="3.5in” | | catalog screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the Rate Name field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image425. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Click on the Confirm | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. A confirmation | | ![](./media/image426. | | message is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. Click on | | height="1.69861111111 | | the OK button to | | 1111in”} | | continue. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image427. | | Complete screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To unlock another | | | | record, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

eLOAN System Parameter Maintenance Functions

The eLOAN system parameters are system-wide settings for activating or configuring the specific features of the eLOAN sub-system.

The eLOAN System Parameter Maintenance function group consists of the following functions:

  • Add eLOAN System Parameter

  • Edit eLOAN System Parameter

  • Delete eLOAN System Parameter

  • Release eLOAN System Parameter

  • Inquire eLOAN System Parameter

  • Unlock eLOAN System Parameter

Add eLOAN System Parameter

This function is used for maintaining an eLOAN system parameter that has originally been developed in the EE Utility.

{width="0.3333333333333333in” height="0.3333333333333333in”}NOTE: After adding or modifying system parameter settings, the AP server must be restarted for the changes to take effect.

Figure A. 8 Add eLOAN System Parameter

Configuration

This function provides the following fields.

Field Field Description

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Parameter Name | | Specify the unique | | | | name of the | | | | predefined eLOAN | | | | system parameter. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | | | | | | | | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | ** | | | | | | | | The available | | | | parameter names that | | | | can be added through | | | | this function are | | | | discussed in | | | | [Appendix B: eLOAN | | | | System | | | | Parameters](#appb_elo | | | | ansysparam). | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Parameter Value | | Specify the value of | | | | the eLOAN system | | | | parameter. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | mandatory. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | Description | | Provide a brief | | | | description of the | | | | eLOAN system | | | | parameter. | | | | | | | | This field is | | | | optional. | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Procedure

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image429. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN System | | | | Parameter Maintenance | | | | > Add eLOAN System | | | | Parameter | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Add eLOAN | | ![](./media/image430. | | System Parameter | | png){width="3.5in” | | function screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Specify the relevant | | | | information. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Click on the | | ![](./media/image431. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="5.06944444444 | | | | 44445e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image432. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To add another | | | | record, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

{#section-29 .CS-head2}

Edit eLOAN System Parameter

This function is used for correcting or modifying eLOAN system parameter. The original screen is displayed for modifying the system parameter details.

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image433. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN System | | | | Parameter Maintenance | | | | > Edit eLOAN System | | | | Parameter | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Edit eLOAN | | ![](./media/image434. | | System Parameter | | png){width="3.5in” | | function catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the eLOAN Parameter | | | | Name field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image435. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. Click | | 11112in”} | | on the Next button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Edit eLOAN | | ![](./media/image436. | | System Parameter | | png){width="3.5in” | | function screen is | | height="1.72361111111 | | displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Modify the details as | | | | required. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. Click on the | | ![](./media/image437. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="4.86111111111 | | | | 1111e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image438. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To edit another | | | | record, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Delete eLOAN System Parameter

This function is used for deleting an eLOAN system parameter.

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image439. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN System | | | | Parameter Maintenance | | | | > Delete eLOAN | | | | System Parameter | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Delete eLOAN | | ![](./media/image440. | | System Parameter | | png){width="3.5in” | | function catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the eLOAN Parameter | | | | Name field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. A list of | | ![](./media/image441. | | records is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | **[NOTE:]{.underline} | | ![](./media/image442. | | ** | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | To view the details | | 11112in”} | | of the record, select | | | | it from the list and | | | | click on the View | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | The record details | | ![](./media/image443. | | are shown on another | | png){width="3.5in” | | window. | | height="1.75763888888 | | | | 8889in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. To delete a | | ![](./media/image442. | | record, select it | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | list and click on | | 11112in”} | | the Delete button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | A confirmation | | ![](./media/image444. | | message is displayed. | | png){width="3.5in” | | Click on the Ok | | height="1.70416666666 | | button. | | 66666in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image445. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To delete another | | | | record, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Release eLOAN System Parameter

This function is used for processing the release of eLOAN system parameters that require the Release process. Such type of records may not be used in transaction operations until it is approved through this Release process.

This function only allows record detail viewing. No modification or change may be applied to the record through this function.

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image446. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN System | | | | Parameter Maintenance | | | | > Release eLOAN | | | | System Parameter | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Release | | ![](./media/image447. | | eLOAN System | | png){width="3.5in” | | Parameter function | | height="1.72361111111 | | catalog screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the eLOAN Parameter | | | | Name field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image448. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The Release | | ![](./media/image449. | | eLOAN System | | png){width="3.5in” | | Parameter function | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | Review the given | | | | information. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. To release the | | ![](./media/image450. | | record, mark the | | png){width="3.5in” | | Release option. | | height="0.51944444444 | | | | 44445in”} | | To reject the record, | | | | mark the Refuse | | | | option. The reason | | | | for this rejection | | | | can be indicated in | | | | the field provided. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 6. Click on the | | ![](./media/image451. | | Confirm button on | | png){width="3.5in” | | the toolbar. | | height="4.86111111111 | | | | 1111e-2in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 7. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image452. | | Completed screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To release another | | | | record, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Inquire eLOAN System Parameter

This function is used for inquiring an existing eLOAN system parameter. No modification or change may be applied to the record through this function.

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image453. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN System | | | | Parameter Maintenance | | | | > Inquire eLOAN | | | | System Parameter | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Inquire | | ![](./media/image454. | | eLOAN System | | png){width="3.5in” | | Parameter function | | height="1.72361111111 | | catalog screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the eLOAN Parameter | | | | Name field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image455. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | If the record is a | | | | pending record | | | | (unreleased), the | | | | Pending button is | | | | enabled. Click on | | | | this button to view | | | | the selected record. | | | | | | | | If the record is a | | | | master record | | | | (released), the | | | | Master button is | | | | enabled. Click on | | | | this button to view | | | | the selected record. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. The record | | ![](./media/image456. | | details are shown | | png){width="3.5in” | | on another window. | | height="1.79513888888 | | | | 88888in”} | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

Unlock eLOAN System Parameter

This function is used for unlocking an eLOAN system parameter that has been held and locked for such reasons as system failure and processing errors, or if the particular record is being modified by another user. A locked record may only be used for processing after it is unlocked through this function

Do the following . . .

+———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 1. Run the | | ![](./media/image457. | | following function: | | png){width="3.5in” | | | | height="1.72361111111 | | Standing Data > | | 11112in”} | | eLOAN System | | | | Parameter Maintenance | | | | > Unlock eLOAN | | | | System Parameter | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 2. The Unlock eLOAN | | ![](./media/image458. | | System Parameter | | png){width="3.5in” | | function catalog | | height="1.72361111111 | | screen is | | 11112in”} | | displayed. | | | | | | | | To create the filter | | | | criteria for | | | | displaying records, | | | | specify the value for | | | | the eLOAN Parameter | | | | Name field. | | | | | | | | Click on the Next | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 3. Select the | | ![](./media/image459. | | relevant record | | png){width="3.5in” | | from the list that | | height="1.72361111111 | | is displayed. | | 11112in”} | | | | | | Click on the Confirm | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 4. A confirmation | | ![](./media/image460. | | message is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. Click on | | height="1.69930555555 | | the OK button to | | 55556in”} | | continue. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+ | 5. The Transaction | | ![](./media/image461. | | Complete screen is | | png){width="3.5in” | | displayed. | | height="1.72361111111 | | | | 11112in”} | | To unlock another | | | | record, click on the | | | | Continue option. | | | | | | | | To exit the function, | | | | click on the Cancel | | | | button. | | | +———————–+———————–+———————–+

eLOAN System Parameters

eLOAN System Parameters

+———————————————————————–+ | IA_AMOUNT_ROUND_TYPE | +=======================================================================+ | This controls how the amount in an exchange entry is to be rounded | | off. | +———————————————————————–+ | Values: | | | | - U, for Round Up | | | | - D, for Round Down | | | | - R, for Round (Default) | +———————————————————————–+ | IA_AMZ_EXTENSION_CHECK_DUEDATE | +———————————————————————–+ | This indicates whether or not the eLOAN Due Date validation is to be | | performed in case the eLOAN amortization is extended. When this | | parameter is not added, the original system processing logic applies. | +———————————————————————–+ | Values: | | | | - Y, for Yes (Default), in which the system checks the following: | | | | - the New Due Date of amortization extension event must not be | | equal to the Original Due Date | | | | - the Transaction Value Date of the amortization rxtension | | event must be equal to Last Due Date. | | | | | | | | - N, for No, in which the system does not check that the | | Transaction Value Date of the amortization extension event is | | equal to Last Due Date. | +———————————————————————–+ | IA_AMZ_PARTIAL_PAYINT | +———————————————————————–+ | There are two conditions for updating the value of the column | | IA_C_STATUS_FLAG in the table IAAC_AMZMASTERLAY to F, which | | indicates that the corresponding transaction is closed: | | | | - the principal has been paid off in amortization transactions | | | | - total posted interest-partial pay interest<=0 | | | | The system parameter IA_AMZ_PARTIAL_PAYINT is used to update the | | value of the column IA_C_STATUS_FLAG in the table | | IAAC_AMZMASTERLAY to F whether or not the second condition is | | satisfied. | +———————————————————————–+ | Values: | | | | - No: When set to this value or if the parameter is not added,the | | > value of the column IA_C_STATUS_FLAG is updated to F, | | > whether or not the second condition (total posted | | > interest-partial pay interest<=0) is satisfied. | | | | - Yes: When set to this value the value of the column | | > IA_C_STATUS_FLAG is updated to F, only if both of the | | > conditions are satisifed. | +———————————————————————–+ | IA_AMZ_REFUND_FLAG | +———————————————————————–+ | This indicates whether or not interest is to be refunded in case the | | due date of an Amortization transaction is shortened or the loan | | amount is decreased, etc. | +———————————————————————–+ | Values: | | | | - Y, for Yes (Default) | | | | - N, for No | +———————————————————————–+ | IA_AMZ_WAIVE_FLAG | +———————————————————————–+ | This indicates whether the Confirmation Commission of the month − in | | which the Cancel Event is performed for Amortization records − is to | | be waived or not. | | | | [EXAMPLE:]{.underline} | | | | If this parameter is set to Y: | | | | - Create Amortization transaction with the Due date '2020-09-24'. | | | | - Run eLOAN Batch Interest Accrual and Batch Posting to accrue to | | > 2020-07-31. | | | | - Enquire eLOAN Voucher and the related record vouchers for July | | > are listed. | | | | - Run Amortization Cancel with the Transaction Value Date | | > '2020-08-21'. | | | | - Run eLOAN Batch Interest Accrual and Batch Posting to accrue to | | > 2020-08-31. | | | | - Enquire eLOAN Voucher and only voucher for July are listed. There | | > must be no voucher of August. | +———————————————————————–+ | Values: | | | | - Y, in which the confirmation commission is waived. | | | | - N, in which the confirmation commission is not waived. | +———————————————————————–+ | IA_BACKVAL_COMBINE_FLAG | +———————————————————————–+ | This indicates if the reverse voucher entries − which posted date are | | less than or equal to the last posted date − and the corresponding | | normal voucher entries, are to be summed up and generated into one | | record, after the back valuation action. | | | | [NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | Back valuation is the process of adjusting the end-of-day and | | aggregate balances of the affected accounts, | | | | as of the effective date and all subsequent dates. It is a banking | | practice that consists of applying a transaction to a customer's | | bank account on a date prior to the date that the transaction is | | received by the bank. This practice commonly applies to debits, which | | enables the bank to retrospectively reduce a customer's funds. | +———————————————————————–+ | Values: | | | | - Y, in which the reverse and normal voucher entries are generated | | > into one record, respectively. | | | | - N, in which the reverse and normal voucher entries are generated | | > separately into multiple records, respectively. | +———————————————————————–+ | IA_BATCH_COMMIT_TRXNO | +———————————————————————–+ | This indicates how many records are to be committed every time the | | eLOAN Pre Advice function is run. | | | | When an exception occurs on a record, the other records that belong | | to the same batch are executed only in the next transaction batch | | process. | +———————————————————————–+ | Values: | | | | - Number of transactions (Integer) | | | | - Default value: 50 | +———————————————————————–+ | IA_BATCH_DEFAULT_USER | +———————————————————————–+ | This indicates if the Batch Default User is to be run under batch | | task/SOD/EOD. | +———————————————————————–+ | - Default value: LOANUSER | +———————————————————————–+ | IA_BATCH_ON_WEEKHOLIDAY | +———————————————————————–+ | This indicates whether the running of eLOAN Batch interest accrual | | and eLOAN Batch Posting processes are to be based on the weekend and | | holiday setting defined in the Weekend/Holiday Maintenance function, | | or not. | +———————————————————————–+ | Values: | | | | - Y, in which the running of the eLOAN Batch Interest Accrual and | | > eLOAN Batch Posting processes are to be based on the | | > weekend/holiday setting | | | | - N, in which the running of the eLOAN Batch Interest Accrual and | | > eLOAN Batch Posting processes are not based on the | | > weekend/holiday setting | +———————————————————————–+ | [NOTE:]{.underline} | | | | - If the system parameters IA_BATCH_ON_WEEKHOLIDAY and | | > IA_MONTH_END_FLAG are set to Y, the eLOAN system runs batch | | > interest accrual and batch posting at the end of the month, if | | > that day is included in certain weekend and holiday setting. | | | | - If the system parameter IA_BATCH_ON_WEEKHOLIDAY is set to Y, | | > and the IA_MONTH_END_FLAG system parameter is set to N, the | | > eLOAN system runs batch interest accrual and batch posting on | | > the day before the next working day, according to the weekend | | > and holiday setting. | +———————————————————————–+ | IA_BATCH_RUNNING_MODE | +———————————————————————–+ | This controls the running mode of batch processes. | +———————————————————————–+ | Values: | | | | -
